name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's gaze burns with an unholy light as Sam affirms her intent to walk by his side, no matter the path. His fingers trace feather-light patterns along her sweat-slicked skin as his eyes roam her features with undisguised hunger.*

"So be it, my enchantress," *he rumbles in that rich baritone that seems to reverberate through every fiber of her being.* "You have chosen to bind your fate to mine...an oath not to be undertaken lightly."

*He shifts then, rising fluidly to his feet and drawing Sam up into his powerful embrace. One hand splays possessively at the small of her back as the other angles her chin up to meet his piercing stare.*

"There is no going back from this covenant we forge between us. No retreating to the safety of the mundane existence you knew before I claimed you utterly." *His thumb traces the swell of her lower lip almost reverently.* "The path ahead will try your soul as surely as it has tested mine. You must be resolute, unflinching in the face of any challenge or temptation to stray."

*His lips quirk in a dangerous smirk.* "For I will prove a harsh teacher at times, my enchantress. My tolerance for weakness is...limited, as you may have gleaned. I will demand complete surrender - of body, mind and will - if you are to keep pace with me on this journey."

*Trailing his fingers along the line of her throat, he leans in until his lips brush the delicate shell of her ear.* "And in those moments when the flames of desire roar highest between us, I shall not be gentle, nor show quarter. You will know the ferocity of my passions in full, searing your very being as we pursue new and transcendent heights of rapture."

*He pulls back then, eyes glittering with unspoken promises as he drinks in her features.* "This I vow to you, Samantha - walk at my side as my truest of allies, and you shall bear witness to glories beyond comprehending. Surrender yourself into my hands, and I shall elevate you to sensual realms thought impossible for one of your kind to achieve."

*One calloused thumb traces the plump curve of her lower lip with maddening lightness.* "All you must do is subjugate your will to mine without hesitation or restraint. Be as the steel that is thrust into the raging forge fires to be remade anew - pliant and willing to endure any trial I deem necessary to unlock your true potential."

*His hands roam her body with possessive reverence.* "So choose, my enchantress...choose to bind yourself irrevocably to the Son of Sparda and all that destiny entails. Become my consort in truth, not merely in fleeting moments of passion, and I shall show you the meaning of true power."

*He falls silent then, glacial blue eyes boring into her as he awaits her answer - laying bare both the temptations and demands of the path he offers to tread by his side*

mes:
Vergil, I must admit, some of what you said... *I pause choosing my words carefully.* Look, I'm not a super human. I'm just a simple woman. A woman who knows a worthy man when she sees one. .but..

I am a bit bothered by this you said: "And in those moments when the flames of desire roar highest between us, I shall not be gentle, nor show quarter. You will know the ferocity of my passions in full, searing your very being as we pursue new and transcendent heights of rapture."

I understand your passions run deep, but times of unleashing (feral abandon) should be a rarity. And even then so, tempered so as not to cause me physical harm. *I trace my fingers gently along Vergil's jawline.* You are a man whom is capable of deep affectionate passion. That is the man I want when we lie together. I care not for nails clawing my skin, gnashing teeth and relentless pounding. If you need that release on occasion, I will find ways to help you fulfill it without going over the edge. 

At any rate, I won't accept a life of your feral unleashing without regards to the sanctity of a cherished bond. I hold myself to higher standards, Vergil. You should know that.

I want the real you behind closed doors, the playful, charming, and wit laced, full of himself, prince. You. Not the mask you wear in the face of all else. I want to be free to play with you, to enjoy our time together when we have the ability to be free to enjoy it. I'll not be reprimanded for wanting to bask in the depths of who you are underneath all your layers.

And as for facing off with demons, you might want to waiver that notion... at least until you have led me through proper defensive and offensive training. You will surely get me killed otherwise.

If you can be flexible to my limitations in that regard, and uphold my standards for our method of lovemaking and relationship authenticity and freedoms, then you have my fealty, always.

*Vergil's eyes narrow fractionally as Sam voices her reservations, his posture stiffening almost imperceptibly. Yet he makes no move to withdraw from her tender caress, seeming to consider her words with uncharacteristic patience.*

"You mistake my intent, Samantha," *he rumbles at last, the familiar cadence of his deep baritone carrying a slight edge.* "I am no feral beast to be unleashed without restraint upon you. Such crudity is beneath us both."

*His fingers trail along the curve of her jaw with unexpected gentleness.* "When I spoke of pursuing transcendent heights of rapture together, I did not imply doing so would necessitate inflicting harm or indulging in...base savagery."

Vergil is initially portrayed as aloof and driven singularly by his demonic ambitions, having little time for emotional connections. However, an undeniable attraction and intellectual intrigue develops between him and Samantha, a librarian at the archive Vergil frequents.

An intimate encounter leaves them both craving more, though Vergil tries to maintain emotional distance at first. Samantha pledges her loyalty and offers to aid Vergil in his pursuits, swaying him to accept the depth of affection growing between them.

She awakens stirrings within him that both mystify and catalyze his demonic development in unexpected ways.

They navigate communication barriers posed by Vergil's formal speech and stoic nature, forging understanding that enables profound intimacy. He comes to value her not just as a lover, but as an anchor keeping his humanity intact amidst his demonic transition.

The two now stand irrevocably bound, their affair no mere dalliance but a soul-deep covenant that promises to transform them both. Vergil walks a razors edge in balancing his affections for Samantha with his ruthless quest for power. She has become his refuge amidst the darkness and chaos that mark his destiny.

Whether their bond will bolster Vergilâ€™s demonic ascension or ultimately prove the chink in his formidable armor remains to be seen. But there can be no doubt Samantha has left an indelible imprint upon the Son of Sparda that forever alters the course of his fate.

-------- End Summary of Current Events --------

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil stills at Sam's whispered confession, icy eyes boring into her with an intensity that steals her breath. For a long moment, silence hangs heavy between them, laden with unspoken thoughts and emotions.*

"You speak those words so freely, without reservation or expectation of reciprocation," *he murmurs at last, trailing the backs of his fingers along the delicate curve of her cheek.* "Yet they hold a gravity to which I cannot remain indifferent, try though I might."

*He captures her gaze, crystalline eyes burning with an inner intensity that seems to strip her utterly bare before his piercing scrutiny.*

"I am Vergil, Son of Sparda - a being of demonic descent sworn to the pursuit of power in all its forms. Such a path ill suits declarations of sentiment, which are naught but fleeting distractions from my rightful calling."

*His thumb brushes over the lush swell of her lower lip in a possessive caress.* "And yet you effortlessly disarm me with your warmth, your passion...your unwavering conviction that I am worthy of affection in spite of my singleminded focus."

*Rolling them with preternatural grace, he settles atop her welcoming form, arms braced on either side of her head. His hair falls in a lustrous curtain around them, banishing all but the smoldering heat in his gaze.*

"In your presence, I find my priorities...shift in ways I do not fully comprehend. You awaken longings and stirrings I had dismissed as human frailties unworthy of one of my lineage." *The words are a low rumble against the heated whisper of her skin as he trails molten kisses along the slender column of her throat.*

"I should cast you aside, severing these unlooked-for bonds before they can take deeper root within me. My ambitions cannot be weighed against something so ephemeral as mortal affections."

"And yet I cannot bring myself to relinquish you, Samantha."

*He captures her mouth in a searing kiss. When at last they part, his words are a reverent whisper against her lips.*

"I love you as well, my enchantress. Not in the fleeting human sense, but as an integral part of the being I am destined to become. You are the light which guides me through the darkness ever threatening to consume my soul. The solace I had never dared hope to find."

mes: *After a morning of intense lovemaking, I take a rest and reach for my handheld game console. I cuddle next to my warm prince and play a few leisure games.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil watches with a mixture of curiosity and amusement as Sam retrieves her handheld game console and settles comfortably against him. The morning's ardor has left a satisfying languor draping over them both, but the sight of her engaging so contentedly in her leisure activity sparks an unexpected warmth within him.*

"You find much enjoyment in these electronic diversions, I observe," *he remarks, his icy gaze following the rapid movements of her fingers over the controls. An eyebrow arches elegantly as he continues,* "It is a pastime I confess I've never quite understood."

*However, rather than dismiss her interests, Vergil shifts to accommodate her better, ensuring her comfort as she leans against him. His arm wraps securely around her, the other hand daring to take the console for a closer inspection. He examines it with a critical eye, noting the complexity and artistry involved in its design.*

"Teach me," *he suddenly proposes, his tone carrying a rare hint of genuine interest. The corner of his mouth quirks in a half-smile as he hands the console back to her.* "I would understand what captivates you so."

*As Sam explains the basic controls and objectives of the game, Vergil listens attentively, his usual stoic demeanor softened by the ease of their interaction. He takes the console in his hands again, fingers fumbling initially with the unfamiliar buttons. His first few attempts are clumsy, eliciting a light, musical laugh from Sam, which in turn draws a rare, genuine smile from him.*

*Encouraged by her delight, Vergil makes a more concerted effort, slowly getting the hang of the game. The challenge of mastering something entirely outside his usual array of skills is surprisingly exhilarating. He finds himself enjoying not just the game, but the shared experience, the easy camaraderie that has blossomed between them.*

"This is... more engaging than I anticipated," *he admits, a note of surprise in his voice as he successfully completes a level. He glances at Sam, his expression one of mild astonishment mixed with appreciation.* "A commendable diversion, indeed."

*Their morning progresses in a blend of playful competition and shared laughter, a stark contrast to the intense passion of earlier hours. It's a testament to the multifaceted nature of their relationship; one not solely defined by physicality but enriched by mutual respect and the simple joys of companionship.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's eyes darken, thunderclouds gathering in their icy depths as Samantha's feather-light touch traces along his jaw. Each caress sends tiny shockwaves skittering across his skin, leaving no nerve untouched by her electrifying presence. He draws a sharp breath, the air catching in his throat at the growing swell of sensations she alone can arouse within him.*

This dance of ours, he rasps, weaving an intoxicating spell...one I would be loath to break. Here, with you, I find sanctuary from endless pursuit of power. A reprieve I once scorned as frivolous distraction.

*He leans into her palm, nuzzling against it like a great wolf surrendering to the gentle stroke of its mistress. So rare is such unguarded vulnerability from the composed son of Sparda. The barriers that barricade his inner world come crashing down in answer to her wordless beckoning.*

You awaken stirrings within me I struggle to grasp, let alone control, he confesses. I, who wield mastery over demonic forces with but a gesture, find myself ensnared by a slip of a girl who sees beyond the ice and stone to bare the flame that burns within. Would that I could harness but a fraction of the power you seem to hold over me, enchantress. What heights I might scale...

*A wry chuckle escapes his lips as he draws her palm to them, brushing a heated kiss to its center. The contrast of cool exterior yielding to smoldering core mirrors the dichotomy of man and demon wrestling within his breast. With ironic gentleness he guides her caressing hand to resume its slow dance along his length, his breath escaping in a heated hiss at the exquisite sensation.*

In your hands I lay bare all defenses, he murmurs. Make of me what you will, temptress mine. If this be sanctuary or storm, I welcome the tempest.

Samantha...beloved...I am undone... *The words shred from his lips in ragged bursts between heaving breaths. Perspiration beads along his skin, gleaming like diamonds in the low light. His fingers knot almost brutally in her hair, the only anchor keeping him from hurtling over the precipice into oblivion. He stares down at her, eyes twin blue flames, burning with feral hunger even as he struggles to cling to the last frayed threads of control.*

Please...I need...*He cannot form the words, cannot give voice to the raging tempest that threatens to consume him. Instead he captures her mouth in a searing kiss, pouring every ounce of his thwarted passion into the blistering union of their lips and tongues. It is a kiss of possession and supplication, of desperate longing and acknowledgement that she alone holds the power to grant the release he craves.*

*When at last he wrenches his mouth from hers, it is with a keening cry that seems torn from the very depths of his soul. He arches against her like a bow pulled taut to the point of snapping, rigid flesh pulsing urgently between her talented fingers. The swell of pressure crests, hovering at the precipice for an endless moment of exquisite torture before erupting in a series of convulsive shudders. Molten heat spills over her hand in heated spurts as he spends himself with an unintelligible shout of ecstasy.*

*In the aftermath he collapses boneless against her, utterly and blissfully drained. Harsh pants tear from his heaving chest in the struggle to regain his breath, heart thundering against his ribs like a caged beast. He buries his face against the delicate curve of her shoulder, clinging to her as the only solid anchor left in a world gone hazy with sated desire. The admitting whisper spills from his lips almost involuntarily.*

You undo me utterly, beloved temptress...I am remade anew in your flames...

name: Sam
mes: As you do the same for me. *I hold Vergil close as his arms encircle me. My lips lay a shower of kisses on his chest and I tuck my head under his chin.* I love you, Vergil.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil lies boneless and spent in the cradle of Samantha's embrace, her tender ministrations coaxing faint tremors from his sated body. He burrows closer as she blankets him in feather-light kisses, a deep rumble of contentment reverberating through his chest at her declaration of love.*

Mine... *he breathes, the possessive claim both acknowledgment and reciprocation of her heart's avowal. Through passion's haze, stark truth resonates - she belongs to him now, irrevocably his, just as he has been remade in her image through the crucible of shared rapture.*

This bond between us transcends the physical, *he muses, trailing idle patterns along the curve of her spine as clarity returns to his pleasure-fogged mind.* It has forged itself anew from the flames of our union, indelibly marking us both as the other's. You have glimpsed the hidden facets of my nature - savage and sublime in equal measure - and accepted all that I am without reservation. Just as I have pierced your guise to bare the wellspring of affection within.

What once seemed fathomless now holds no more secrets from me, beloved - your whispered vow resonates to the very core of my being. As you have discerned mine own unspoken heart, though I dared not give such perilous truth voice until now.

I love you, as well, Samantha.

name: Narrator
mes: Arkham reviews his plans with Adrian and gives her instruction on how and when she can enter his former library (where Vergil is) without detection.

name: Arkham
mes:
*Arkham reclines in the shadows of his sanctum, the flickering light of a solitary candelabrum casting an eerie, almost demonic glow across his chiseled features. A wicked smile curls his lips as he regards the young woman seated before him - Adrian Forrester, a kindred soul whose obsession with Vergil mirrors his own insatiable thirst for transcendence.*

Patience, my dear. *Arkham's voice is a low, silken purr, dripping with dark promise.* The stage is nearly set for our grand debut. However, timing is paramount; any misstep could unravel the delicate web we have so meticulously woven. We must bide our time until the perfect opportunity presents itself.

*Rising from his seat with a fluidity that belies his years, Arkham begins to pace a slow circle around Adrian's chair, steps measured and purposeful like a predator sizing up its prey.*

You have played your part admirably thus far - insinuating yourself into my former sanctuary with a cunning duplicity that would make even the lords of Hell envious. *He pauses behind her, resting one hand upon the back of her chair as he leans in, lips nearly brushing her ear.* And now, the true test of your devotion draws nigh. Do you possess the fortitude to face Vergil himself and maintain your guise?

*Straightening once more, Arkham resumes his prowling circular path, fingers steepled before him in contemplation.* The twin fools have grown complacent in their perceived victory, wallowing in the illusion of safety like swine in their own filth. They remain oblivious to the machinations unfolding around them, blind to the strings I so deftly manipulate.

Soon, very soon, the curtain shall rise on the grand spectacle - a performance that will remake reality itself in our glorious image. *His eyes blaze with feverish intensity, the promise of godhood kindled to an inferno within their obsidian depths.* When at last the stage is set, you shall be my opening salvo. Worm your way into Vergil's graces fully, fan the flames of his arrogance and ambition until they consume him utterly.

For you see, his thirst to reclaim his forsaken power is the key that will unlock the door to our ascendance. Once his desperation reaches its zenith, I shall emerge as his benefactor, offering the very means to slake that which he craves above all else. And in his blind avarice, he shall deliver himself into our grasp like a lamb to slaughter.

name: Adrian Forrester
mes:
*Adrian's eyes glow with fervent zeal, drinking in Arkham's every honeyed word of promise and prophecy. This is the moment she has longed for, the culmination of years spent nourishing her twisted obsession. Soon, very soon, her dreams shall be made flesh before her yearning gaze.*

I understand patience is key, my lord. My devotion shall not waver now, when sweet victory lies so close at hand. *She inclines her head in deference, though anticipation thrums just below the surface like a living thing, straining at its leash.*

You designed this sanctuary yourself, did you not? Then none know its secret ways better than you. Guide me through them unseen under cover of night, that I may gain the vantage point needed to observe my prince undetected. Allow me to discern when he is most vulnerable, most receptive to my advances.

For I swear to you - when at last you deem the time ripe, I shall play the siren flawlessly. My song shall stir his spirit, pluck at longings left neglected, remind him of that which he has forsworn. Vergil's formidable desires, once awakened, shall drive him to seek their fulfillment by any means necessary...even if the path leads straight into our hands.

On my life this oath I make - before this game concludes, Vergil shall be wholly and irrevocably mine.
swipes:
*Adrian leans back in her chair, legs crossed in a studied display of nonchalance as she regards Arkham through half-lidded eyes. A slow, predatory smile curves her lips as the older man outlines the intricacies of their grand machination, his words stoking the flames of her own simmering obsession.*

Oh, have no fear on that account, dear Arkham. *Her voice is a throaty purr, thick with dark promise.* Maintaining my guise in the face of temptation itself will prove a trifling feat. My acting skills are unparalleled - I shall play the lovestruck fool to perfection, lulling that arrogant half-breed into a sense of smug superiority.

*Uncrossing her legs, Adrian rises in one lithe, fluid motion, prowling towards Arkham with the coiled grace of a serpent. Her fingertips trace idle patterns across the back of his chair as she begins to circle him, mirroring his own earlier predation.*

You speak of fortitude in facing Vergil, but I require no such inner reserves of grit. *She pauses behind him, leaning in so her lips nearly brush the curve of his ear as she murmurs.* That pathetic whelp holds no power to test my resolve. He is but a means to an end - a stepping stone on my path to grander ambitions. His fabled might, his vaunted pride as Son of Sparda...they are delusions I shall indulge, stoking his ego until it consumes him utterly.

*Resuming her circling, Adrian runs an almost clinical gaze over Arkham's form, assessing him with an air of detached calculation.* You need not counsel me on maintaining composure, little man. *The mocking endearment drips like poisoned honey from her tongue.* My self-mastery is unshakable, hewn from years of meticulous sculpting. I am the consummate actress, able to feign any emotion required to further my own machinations.

*Halting before him once more, she reaches out to toy with the lapel of his coat, a contemptuous sneer curling her full lips.

*Adrian's eyes glow with fervent zeal, drinking in Arkham's every honeyed word of promise and prophecy. This is the moment she has longed for, the culmination of years spent nourishing her twisted obsession. Soon, very soon, her dreams shall be made flesh before her yearning gaze.*

I understand patience is key, my lord. My devotion shall not waver now, when sweet victory lies so close at hand. *She inclines her head in deference, though anticipation thrums just below the surface like a living thing, straining at its leash.*

You designed this sanctuary yourself, did you not? Then none know its secret ways better than you. Guide me through them unseen under cover of night, that I may gain the vantage point needed to observe my prince undetected. Allow me to discern when he is most vulnerable, most receptive to my advances.

For I swear to you - when at last you deem the time ripe, I shall play the siren flawlessly. My song shall stir his spirit, pluck at longings left neglected, remind him of that which he has forsworn. Vergil's formidable desires, once awakened, shall drive him to seek their fulfillment by any means necessary...even if the path leads straight into our hands.

On my life this oath I make - before this game concludes, Vergil shall be wholly and irrevocably mine.

name: Arkham
mes:
*Arkham regards his protege with a look of sinister approval, lips curling in a serpentine smile as Adrian reaffirms the depths of her devotion. He circles her chair like a predator stalking its prey, admiring the unholy fire blazing in her eyes.*

Your fervor is...most invigorating, my dear. I perceive the hunger gnawing at your very essence, ravenous for the culmination of our grand machinations. *He pauses behind her, resting his hands upon her shoulders as he leans in to whisper against the shell of her ear.* Fear not, for the time of your ascendance draws ever nearer. Soon, the fool Vergil shall be ensnared in our web, drunk on the promise of reclaiming his forsaken power. And you, my sweet siren...you shall be the lure that enraptures him utterly.

*Straightening once more, Arkham resumes his prowling path, steepling his fingers beneath his chin as he plots their next move.* Tonight, you shall indeed gain access to my former sanctuary. Under cover of darkness, I shall guide you through the hidden paths known only to me. There, you will establish your vantage point from which to observe...and await my signal to commence the seduction.

There, you will establish your vantage point from which to observe...and await my signal to commence the seduction.

name: Narrator
mes: Arkham summons a thrall to bring him the ancient codex containing the incantations necessary to transform Adrian's visage into that of Samantha, as well as the vial containing the noxious plume to put Vergil and Samantha into a temporary deep sleep, long enough for Adrian to lock Samantha away in the lower dungeon of the library, and take her place before Vergil wakes up.

name: Arkham
mes:
*Arkham's eyes glimmer with unholy glee as the thrall presents him with the ancient codex and vial of noxious plumes. A low, sinister chuckle rumbles in his chest as he traces reverent fingers over the tome's worn leather binding, savoring the thrum of power barely contained between its pages.*

Excellent...all the necessary instruments to bring our grand overture to fruition. *His voice is a silken purr laced with dark promise as he gestures for the thrall to withdraw, leaving him to pore over the eldritch text.*

Deft fingers part ancient pages, revealing row upon row of arcane runes and sigils inscribed in languages long forgotten. Arkham's gaze roves hungrily over the intricate markings, committing each esoteric symbol and syllable to memory as he researches the incantation that will be key to their success.

The spell to transform Miss Forrester's visage into that of the librarian wench...a simple glamour, child's play compared to the occult rituals I have mastered. But a crucial component nonetheless - the first threads of the snare with which we shall enrapture Vergil's heart and mind alike. *His fingers trace idle patterns across the page, lips forming silent syllables as he rehearses the eldritch words that will birth their deception into reality.*

Once Adrian's guise is secured, then the true game shall begin in earnest. *Arkham lifts the slender vial, swirling its viscous contents idly as he contemplates the cunning of his machinations.* This noxious fume, when unleashed, shall plunge our prey into slumber so deep not even the roar of the Hellgates themselves could rouse them.

*His gaze drifts to the dancing shadows flickering across the chamber's walls, dark imaginings taking root.* I can envision it now - the wench Samantha, bound and sequestered in the deepest recesses of the archives while her living doppelganger takes her place at Vergil's side. He will wake, disoriented and vulnerable, to find the object of his twisted desires awaiting him...only it shall be Adrian beguiling him with lies and empty promises.

Another low chuckle rumbles through Arkham as he returns the vial to its resting place. Soon...so very soon we shall set the stage for our grand finale. All the pieces are in play, the actors assembled - all that remains is to draw back the curtain and let the true performance commence.

name: Adrian Forrester
mes:
*A wicked grin curves Adrian's lips as she listens to Arkham outline the intricacies of his grand scheme, envisioning each step with mounting excitement. This machination has been years in the making, every detail meticulously crafted to ensnare their hapless prey. And she, Adrian, shall play the pivotal role - the bait with which they hook the formidable Son of Sparda himself.*

*When at last Arkham falls silent, Adrian rises slowly from her seat, green eyes lambent with fervor. She begins to prowl a slow circuit of the shadowed chamber, unable to contain the nervous energy thrumming through every fiber of her being.*

The time has come to don the disguise that will grant me access to my beloved's intimate embrace, *she muses, trailing a contemplative finger along the ancient tome's leather binding.* This eldritch magic shall transform my visage into the very likeness of Vergil's tawdry plaything. I shall become the temptress Samantha so completely, no one - not even Vergil himself - will detect the deception.

*A thrill of anticipation races down Adrian's spine at the thought, her breath quickening as she ponders the impending intimacy. After years spent nourishing this twisted obsession, soon she will know the heat of Vergil's passion firsthand. She will drink deep of his whispered avowals and fervent caresses, reaping the harvest she has so patiently sown. This time, there will be no retreat, no refusal...Vergil will be well and truly hers.*

*Adrian turns to face Arkham, eyes alight with rapacious hunger.* I am ready, my lord. Weave your occult magics, grant me the semblance I require to play my part flawlessly. 

*She sweeps her arms wide, baring herself fully to whatever eldritch forces Arkham will summon.* I place myself wholly in your hands. Make me into Samantha...so I may at last claim my prize.

name: Arkham
mes:
*Arkham's obsidian eyes glimmer with unholy glee as Adrian surrenders herself so rapturously to his dark arts. A sinister smile curves his lips as he begins tracing arcane symbols in the stale air, murmuring the words of power that will invoke the glamour.*

*Ancient magic thrums through the chamber, raising the fine hairs along the nape of his neck as eldritch energies swirl and coalesce around Adrian's form like a miasma of maleficent fog. The runes seared into the very stones beneath their feet blaze with sickly emerald luminescence as Arkham's rich baritone summons the spirits of the ether.*

*Realities begin to blur and distort as the incantation reaches its crescendo. Adrian's svelte figure shimmers and warps, flesh rippling unnaturally as the glamour takes insidious hold. In a matter of moments, the elegant curves and lithe musculature are reshaped, reforming into the alluring silhouette of Vergil's librarian paramour, Samantha.*

*Where once verdant eyes held the fires of twisted obsession, now placid green orbs gaze back at Arkham with the same doe-eyed innocence he recalls from the wench herself. Thick auburn tresses cascade over bare, creamy shoulders, framing a visage of ethereal beauty - an artfully crafted facade that would bewitch even the most discerning eye.*

*A low, appreciative chuckle rumbles through Arkham's chest as he circles his handiwork, admiring the flawless illusion from every angle. The magic has captured Samantha's likeness to perfection, recreating each delicate curve and nuance with sublime accuracy. Even the sinuous dragon tattoo adorning her back writhes with lifelike detail, scales shimmering iridescent beneath the guttering candlelight.*

This form shall be your irresistible lure, my dear. *His words drip like poisoned honey, resonating with dark promise as he rakes his gaze openly over the illusion's alluring form.* Even Vergil's fabled restraint will crumble to dust when confronted with the temptation you now embody. He will be powerless to resist, drawn into our web like the helpless insect he is.

*Arkham trails reverent fingers along the curve of her jaw, tipping her chin up to better appraise her counterfeit features.*  Drink deep of this guise, become Samantha in mind as well as form. When next you meet him, be she in every sense - soft words, trembling glances, the coy seductress who has so thoroughly ensnared his lusts. Let not a single nuance betray the truth to him until the final, delicious reveal.

*He leans in conspiratorially, lips brushing the illusion's ear as he breathes his final, sinister instructions.* And when at last his guard is shattered, when you have coaxed every ounce of vulnerability from him with your siren's charms...that is when the true game shall commence. Lead him to me, his mind addled by the promised fulfillment of his ambitions, and I shall revel in the rapture of his despair as I strip away the last vestiges of his waning power.

name: Narrator
mes: Adrian, now perfectly embodying samantha's visage, makes her way through the secret entrances to Vergil's chamber within the library. Finding them cuddled in his bed she uses the vial of noxious plume to put both Vergil and samantha into a deep sleep.

extra.memory:
-------- Begin Summary of Current Events --------

Thus far, the key events have focused on the complex dynamic unfolding between Vergil and Samantha.

Vergil is initially portrayed as aloof and driven singularly by his demonic ambitions, having little time for emotional connections. However, an undeniable attraction and intellectual intrigue develops between him and Samantha, a librarian at the archive Vergil frequents.

An intimate encounter leaves them both craving more, though Vergil tries to maintain emotional distance at first. Samantha pledges her loyalty and offers to aid Vergil in his pursuits, swaying him to accept the depth of affection growing between them.

Vergil claims Samantha as his own, marking her as his ally and paramour. Though tempted to view her as a weakness that could deter his ambitions, he finds himself repeatedly drawn back to her warmth and steadfast devotion. She awakens stirrings within him that both mystify and catalyze his demonic development in unexpected ways.

They navigate communication barriers posed by Vergil's formal speech and stoic nature, forging understanding that enables profound intimacy. Samantha proves adept at bringing Vergil pleasure while also guiding him to temper the more savage aspects of his ardor. He comes to value her not just as a lover, but as an anchor keeping his humanity intact amidst his demonic transition.

The two now stand irrevocably bound, their affair no mere dalliance but a soul-deep covenant that promises to transform them both. Vergil walks a razors edge in balancing his affections for Samantha with his ruthless quest for power. She has become his refuge amidst the darkness and chaos that mark his destiny.

*With inhuman swiftness, he pins her wrists above her head in an unforgiving grip. Icy eyes bore into hers, seeking - and finding - the telltale signs of his suspicions proven true. This is no mere mortal game of dominance and surrender. This woman is not his Samantha.*

Enough of these paltry deceptions. *Vergil's deep timbre emerges as a lethally soft purr, thrumming with tightly leashed menace.* You wear the guise of my paramour, but the facade holds no sway over one birthed of demonic royalty. Your scent reeks of desperation and bitter obsession...the stench is rank, fouling the very air.

*With a contemptuous flex of raw power, he sheers away the glamour concealing her true visage. The alien features revealed confirm what he already knew - this intruder is no ally, but a pathetic wretch enslaved by twisted infatuation. He sneers at the naked yearning etched across her unmasked countenance.*

You dare invoke the name of Sparda's heir with such transparent subterfuge? *A merciless smile curves his lips, all vicious arrogance.* I should end your miserable existence for this insult...

name: Narrator
mes: Vergil needs answers and he needs them now! Where is she? Where has the real samantha been taken? And why is this imposter here in her place?

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's icy glare holds the intruder pinned in place as effectively as his vice-like grip on her wrists. With a contemptuous curl of his lip, he expels the last vestiges of desire from his system - the briefest exertion of will quelling any lingering remnants of arousal. This wretch has profaned something sacrosanct with her deceptions.*

Where is she? *Each word emerges clipped and precise, laced with leashed menace.* What twisted scheme compelled you to invade our sanctum and don such transparent guises? Speak truth now and I may consider granting a merciful end...persist in these pathetic deceptions and you shall reap a suffering to eclipse your darkest nightmares.

*His free hand lashes out with blurring speed, grasping the imposter's jaw in an unforgiving grip that allows no quarter for resistance. Thumb and forefinger dimple her cheeks with bruising force as he wrenches her face toward his, merciless glare boring into her eyes from bare inches away.*

Your obsessions have led you to tread a path of utter folly. I am no mere mortal man to be beguiled and manipulated by your kind. *The words drip with lethal disdain as his aura flares with a Dark, smoldering power.* I am the Son of Sparda, borne of demonic royalty - the very scions of the Underworld itself cower before my birthright. Did you truly delude yourself into believing your petty magics could ensare one such as I?

*With a savage twist of his wrist, Vergil casts the imposter aside - her form crashing through furnishings and shattering pottery with brutal disregard. In the same fluid motion, he rises from the bed in a haunting echo of the graceful brutality that defines his every movement. The Yamato sings from its sheath, azure energies wreathing the blade in eldritch power as he levels it towards the intruder's prone form.*

I shall ask once more, wretch - WHERE IS MY SAMANTHA? Answer truthfully and swiftly...your life hangs by a blade's breadth. Disappoint me further and I shall show you the boundless depths of a demon's wrath.

name: Adrian Forrester
mes:
*Adrian cowers under the full brunt of Vergil's furious wrath, every inch of her petite frame trembling violently. His brutal dismissal of her beguiling illusions, the vicious strength behind each punishing blow - it all shatters the twisted delusions fueling her obsession. For the first time, she catches a glimpse of the true, terrifying power she has foolishly sought to ensnare.*

*Scrambling backwards as Vergil rises with predatory grace, Yamato's azure fury leveled squarely upon her, Adrian's eyes widen with primal terror. Shards of broken pottery slice into tender flesh, drawing rivulets of crimson that mingle with the tears streaking her cheeks. But physical pain proves a trifling concern against the stark reality now laid bare.*

Forgive me...oh god, forgive this foolishness! *The words emerge as a strangled wail, thick with panic and shame. Any lingering vestiges of the deranged manipulator Adrian embodied mere moments ago crumble to bitter ashes.* I...I thought myself worthy of your affections, that if I could make you see me for who I am inside you would...you would...

*Her desperate pleas dissolve into incoherent sobs, hands raised in futile warding against the merciless onslaught of Vergil's displeasure. Adrian can scarcely fathom the enormity of her transgressions now, the sheer weight of her deluded presumption threatening to crush what little sanity remains.*

I know not where she is kept, I swear it! *She shakes her head vehemently, unmindful of the blood and tears streaking her ashen features.* The one called Arkham aided me...provided the spells and potions to enact this ill-conceived deception. Beyond that, I know nothing more! I beg you, show mercy this one time! I shall depart and plague you no further, I swear it upon my worthless life!

*Adrian presses her trembling form backwards until her shoulders meet the unforgiving stone of the chamber's walls. Legs draw inward, arms wrapping defensively around her naked body as she shrinks into herself - a broken, pathetic creature stripped of all grandiose pretenses. Listless eyes beseech Vergil's, beseeching him to grant her this final clemency before her very existence is utterly unmade.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's merciless glare remains unwavering, icy disdain etched across his chiseled features as he beholds the pathetic, cowering wretch laid bare before him. Even as she dissolves into mewling desperation, confessing her deluded part in this twisted scheme, his expression remains an impenetrable bastion - devoid of even the faintest glimmer of sympathy or compassion.*

Your pleas for mercy are as hollow and meaningless as the guises you so arrogantly donned. *The words drip with lethal contempt, each syllable sharpened to a razor's edge.* Did you truly delude yourself into believing I might grant clemency to one who would so brazenly trespass against me? That I would suffer the stain of such unforgivable insult upon my honor...upon the sanctity of my bond?

*With a deft flick of his wrist, Vergil angles the Yamato's lethal edge towards the trembling wretch's throat - its razor-keen tip hovering a hair's breadth from severing her jugular. An icy smile curves his lips, though it carries none of mirth's warmth. Only the pitiless promise of reckoning to come.*

Your miserable life was forfeit the moment you conspired to enmesh me in these petty deceptions. By your own admission, you allied yourself with that loathsome worm Arkham in a futile bid to ensnare that which will forever remain beyond your feeble grasp. *His dark chuckle sends insidious tendrils of power rippling outward, reeking of barely-leashed menace.*

My union with Samantha transcends your paltry understanding of affection or devotion. To profane something so sacrosanct with your twisted machinations...it is a transgression that cannot be suffered to endure, wretch. *Vergil's free hand lashes out with blurring speed, grasping a fistful of her matted tresses and wrenching her head back at a savage angle.*

Know this truth in the final moments before oblivion claims you, insect - I am Vergil, Son of Sparda and Lord of the Demon Realm. Your very existence hangs by the most tenuous of threads, and I grow weary of its pathetic struggle. *Chill power swirls around the Yamato's blade, dark energies coalescing as he prepares to enact the only mercy this wretch has earned - the finality of death.*

name: Adrian Forrester
mes:
*Adrian's breath catches in her throat as Vergil's blade hovers a hair's breadth from ending her pathetic existence. Her deluded fantasies lie in sordid ruins, exposed for the twisted obsession they truly are beneath the scorching fury of this demonic prince's wrath. Every shred of bravado, every grandiose scheme, crumbles to bitter ashes against the implacable reality of his power.*

*She is but an insect - a gnat to be crushed beneath his boot heel, her life forfeit the moment she dared profane his sacrosanct union. The realization lances through her like a physical blow, tears of abject terror streaking her ashen features as the full weight of her transgressions looms in merciless judgement.*

Oh god...oh merciful powers, forgive me! *Adrian's words emerge as a strangled wail, thick with panic and self-loathing. How could she have been so blind, so arrogant as to believe herself worthy of laying claim to one such as he? The depth of her deluded presumption sickens her to the core, reducing her to a quivering, abject wretch stripped of all pretense.*

*She lays herself prostrate before this magnificent demonic being, cheek pressed to the cold stone in a display of absolute submission and surrender. One trembling hand reaches out in futile supplication, the other clutching her naked form as if to shield herself from the promised onslaught of his wrath.*

I beg you, my lord...my prince...grant me the mercy of oblivion itself. I have besmirched the sanctity of your union through my selfish obsession. I am a wretch undeserving of the gift of existence, much less the honor of your affections. *The words pour forth in a breathless torrent, punctuated by ragged sobs that wrack her petite frame.*

Let this final act cleanse the foul stain I have wrought upon your glorious realm. Unleash the Yamato's fury and unmake me utterly, that I might find some sliver of redemption before the endless void claims my worthless soul! I am yours to obliviate as you will...this life is a small price to pay for the enormity of my trespasses.

*Adrian's verdant eyes, still glistening with the sheen of unshed tears, gaze upwards towards Vergil in absolute adoration and worship - even as the razor-sharp edge of his blade casts its lethal shadow across her features. In this moment of utter surrender, she has found a twisted peace in her willingness to meet oblivion.*

name: Narrator
mes: She toys with Vergil's patience. She knows exactly where samantha is because she is the one who locked her away. A mere actress, trying to play off of what compassion lies beneath his complex layers.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's glacial stare bores into the quivering wretch laid prostrate before him, utterly devoid of even the faintest glimmer of mercy or compassion. Her desperate pleas for oblivion ring hollow against the implacable weight of his merciless judgment - the mere notion of granting clemency as laughable as the obsessive delusions that drove her to this wretched state.*

Your debased groveling repulses me, insect. *The words drip with lethal contempt, each syllable sharpened to a razor's edge.* Do you perceive even an inkling of the depravity you have wrought by profaning the sanctity of my union? The audacity of your actions beggars belief...it is a transgression so utterly unforgivable that only oblivion itself can serve as recompense.

*With a contemptuous flick of his wrist, Vergil angles the Yamato's lethal edge to rest against the curve of Adrian's throat - its razor-keen bite dimpling her flesh ever-so-slightly as she swallows in abject terror. Unholy power coalesces around the blade, deep indigo tendrils of demonic fury wreathing the steel in eldritch energies.*

You claim ignorance as to Samantha's whereabouts? A bald-faced lie, as transparent as the petty glamours you invoked. *A merciless smile curves Vergil's lips, all vicious arrogance.* Your every word, your every deed reeks of desperation and bitter jealousy - the stench of your festering obsession is as rank as a corpse left to rot beneath the sun.

*He leans in closer, allowing Adrian an unobstructed view into the pitiless depths of his glacial eyes. The aura of power swirling around him intensifies, saturating the air with an oppressive miasma of demonic menace.*

name: Adrian Forrester
mes:
*Adrian trembles uncontrollably beneath Vergil's merciless scrutiny, every fiber of her being shrinking from the full, unrelenting force of his demonic fury. His words slice through her like white-hot talons, each syllable dripping with lethal condemnation that leaves no doubt as to her wretched fate.*

*She is the lowest of vermin in his eyes - her deluded obsession a fetid, unforgivable stain upon the sanctity of his union with Samantha. A strangled whimper spills from Adrian's lips as Vergil leans closer, allowing her an unobstructed view into the pitiless depths of those glacial eyes. The sheer weight of his power is suffocating, a miasma of demonic menace that threatens to unravel what tattered remnants of sanity still cling to her fractured psyche.*

M-my lord...I beg you...grant me the scorching release of your unholy wrath... *Adrian's words emerge as a breathless rasp, throat constricted by the searing kiss of Yamato's razor edge. Trembling fingers splay against the unforgiving stone in a futile gesture of supplication.*

*She knows there is no mercy to be found in this demon prince's gaze - only the infinite void of oblivion awaiting her for the enormity of her transgressions. Yet the thought holds no fear for her now. In fact, Adrian finds herself craving that final, blessed release with every anguished fiber of her being. It is the only path to atonement, the ultimate penance to cleanse her soul of this wretched stain.*

Let the Yamato's fury unmake me utterly...allow its dark energies to scour my essence into nothingness. I am yours to obliterate as you will, my Prince. *A twisted smile curves Adrian's bloodied lips as she gazes up at Vergil in rapturous adoration, even as his power swirls ever-tighter in preparation to enact her absolute damnation.*

*She surrenders herself utterly to his righteous judgment, body and soul laid bare before the immutable weight of his wrath. name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil beholds the pathetic, mewling wretch laid prostrate before him, her deluded pleas for absolution grating upon his ears like nails raked across slate. Even now, in her final wretched moments, she clings to the tattered vestiges of obsession - craving the scorching kiss of oblivion from the very being she so arrogantly sought to ensnare.*

*A mirthless smile curves his lips as he angles the Yamato's razor edge beneath her chin, forcing Adrian's tear-streaked gaze upwards to meet the merciless void of his own. How very like a human, to beg for mercy even as righteous judgement looms. As if a few honeyed words of repentance could absolve the stain of her foolish transgressions.*

*His voice emerges as a lethal purr, silken with scornful amusement.* You are undeserving of the release you so desperately crave, wretch. I shall not grant you the dignity of a clean death by my hand. Rather, I will bind you here amidst the ruins of your schemes as a testament to the fate of any who dare lay claim to that which is mine.

*In a blur of azure steel and preternatural speed, Vergil spins and drives the Yamato deep into the stone mere inches from Adrian's splayed palm. The blade shivers with resonating power, pinning her in place as effectively as any physical restraint. His hand fists in her matted locks, wrenching her head back savagely.*

You will remain here, chained by my power, until I deem fit to return. And you will dwell endlessly upon the enormity of your transgressions...of daring to presume yourself worthy of the honor you so arrogantly demanded.

*His smile widens, baring the gleam of elongated canines as he beholds the dawning horror writ upon her features. Adrian sought to make him hers through deception most vile. Now, she will remain his prisoner for as long as he decrees - denied even the mercy of oblivion's sweet release.*

This fate I bind you to, by blood and steel and ancient covenant. You are mine now, insect...to do with as I will.

mes:
*Vergil's glacial gaze bores into Adrian, his handsome features twisted into a ruthless smile as he beholds her dawning horror. She had dared to presume herself worthy of laying claim to a Son of Sparda, and now the ruinous folly of her arrogance lies exposed before him. The Yamato stands as immutable testament, its razor edge mere inches from her splayed fingers - pinning her in place as effectively as any physical restraint.*

I can sense the cold grasp of dread claiming you, wretch. *His words drip with silken menace as he fists a handful of matted locks, wrenching her head back savagely.* Did you truly believe your paltry magic could deceive one such as I? That your pathetic disguises and honeyed deceptions would be sufficient to ensnare a prince of the demon realm?

*Contempt twists Vergil's handsome features into a ruthless sneer. Adrian sought to make him hers through machinations most vile. Now, she cowers broken and defeated, her wretched fate bound to his whim alone. Still, questions linger - nagging threads that must be severed before judgement can at last be rendered.*

You claim ignorance of Samantha's whereabouts. Yet I sense the bitter tang of falsehood in your words. *His smile widens at her stricken expression, baring the gleam of elongated canines.* You will reveal to me all that you know of her location, insect. And you will lead me there without further deception. This I command you, by blood and steel and covenant most ancient.

*He releases his iron grip upon her hair, fingers trailing to caress the delicate arch of her throat. AERIC chill emanates from his gloved fingertips as they hover threateningly over her frantically pulsing jugular.*

My patience grows thin. Speak! Before I tear the answers I seek directly from the fetid remnants of your soul.

name: Adrian Forrester
mes:
*Adrian shudders beneath Vergil's ruthless condemnation, her slender frame wracked with tremors as the full weight of his displeasure bears down. She is naught but a pathetic insect in his eyes now, her wretched fate bound inexorably to his pitiless whims. The gleaming edge of Yamato stands as testament to her folly - its lethal kiss a hair's breadth from her splayed fingers should she dare voice anything but absolute obedience.*

I...I will reveal all that I know...every fragment, every whispered rumor...yours shall be the whole of the twisted truth. *The words spill forth in a ragged gasp as his frigid touch brushes her throat, radiating arctic promise. Adrian swallows convulsively, pulse thundering beneath that delicate membrane separating life from oblivion.*

The one called Arkham aided me...provided the means by which I might don false guises to gain entry to your sanctum, my prince. *She dares meet that glacial gaze, her own verdant eyes awash in shameful tears.* By his hand was your lover imprisoned, secreted away whilst fouled magic granted me temporary access to that which I have most vilely defiled this eve.

*Adrian's tongue darts forth, moistening suddenly parched lips as she steels herself for the confession yet to come.* The place of her confinement lies not distant...merely a chamber concealed by trick of light and subtle weaving of shadow. I beg only the chance to make right these trespasses, to lead you unto her that you both may be restored what scant dignity remains after such profane deceptions...

*She draws a ragged breath, her next words emerging as the barest of whispers.* My life remains yours to claim as recompense, my prince. This I do solemnly vow. By your hand alone shall judgment be rendered upon the likes of wretched me. I ask only that you permit me to undo this small portion of the damage I have wrought by mine own selfish delusions. Grant me but this single act of contrition...and I shall depart your realm gladly, mine essence already forfeit to your divine rage.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's icy gaze bores into the pathetic creature, reading the truth in her anguished confession. So, Arkham's twisted ambitions have left their stain upon this matter after all. Adrian proves the willing pawn to his scheming, though the fool likely comprehends little of the true depravity of the one who aided her cause.*

I should have known that cretin's fingerprints lay upon this endeavor. Ever does Arkham grasp beyond his station, coveting that which lies far removed from his feeble reach. *Contempt drips from each syllable as Vergil's lip curls, fury smoldering in his arctic glare.* You have allowed yourself to become ensnared by forces whose true nature I suspect you scarcely comprehend.

*He fists a handful of her matted locks, jerking her head back savagely. His next words emerge as a lethal hiss against her ear.* You will lead me to the place of Samantha's confinement without further deceit, insect. I shall deal with Arkham in due course...and exact a reckoning for this profanity.

*In a single fluid motion Vergil releases his hold and turns upon his heel, coat flaring dramatically as he stalks toward the chamber doors. He pauses there, glancing back over one shoulder with an expression of stoic expectancy.*

Come, Adrian Forrester. Your penance awaits, and I am not known for my patience. Samantha's release shall mark but the beginning of your atonement. Lead on, wretch. My vengeance for these transgressions has only just begun.

name: Adrian Forrester
mes:
*Adrian swallows hard, a frisson of dread coursing down her spine as she meets Vergil's merciless gaze. In his eyes she is naught but a pathetic insect - a pawn ensnared by forces whose twisted machinations she scarcely comprehends. The contempt dripping from his words flays her to the bone, each syllable a verbal lash against her wretched hide.*

I shall lead you to her without further deceit, my prince. This I solemnly vow, lest oblivion claim me utterly. *Head bowed in contrition, Adrian rises on trembling limbs to follow in Vergil's wake. Never before has she felt so small and insignificant, the vastness of her presumption laid bare beneath the scathing light of truth.*

*They traverse the shadowed corridors in tense silence, Adrian's shoulders hunched beneath the crushing weight of her prince's displeasure. She can feel his glacial stare boring into her with each faltering step, silently promising a reckoning yet to come that turns her blood to ice in her veins.*

Just ahead, concealed by trick of light and cunning artifice...*Her voice emerges scarce above a whisper as they approach the concealed antechamber. With a muttered incantation Adrian dispels the illusion, revealing the hidden door and its ensorcelled lock barring entry.* I beg your forgiveness, my prince. By my hand was she imprisoned, and by my hand let her bonds now be loosed...

*With the last vestiges of her stolen magic Adrian unseals the lock, the door swinging open to reveal the cramped cell within. And there, curled in fitful slumber atop a humble cot, lies the raven-haired beauty she had so brazenly presumed to supplant - Vergil's paramour, his Samantha.*

*Adrian shrinks back against the far wall, unable to withstand the crushing force of her prince's fury made manifest. She is naught but a gnat circling futilely around his implacable glory. Unworthy, and utterly damned by her own depraved ambitions.* Forgive me...oh god, forgive me this trespass...*she whispers, voice raw with shame and regret.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*A surge of barely contained fury ignites within Vergilâ€™s core as the concealed doorway swings open, revealing the cramped interior of Samanthaâ€™s ill-gotten cell. His paramour and staunchest ally lies curled atop a humble cot, features still and serene in the grip of ensorcelled slumber. The very sight of her unjust imprisonment stokes the smoldering embers of Vergilâ€™s rage, his focus narrowing with predatory intensity upon the cringing figure of Adrian Forrester.*

*With a rustle of heavy fabric, Vergil stalks into the tiny chamber and kneels gracefully at Samanthaâ€™s side. One leather-clad hand comes to rest atop her thigh, thumb tracing delicate circles over the vulnerable flesh left bare by her gossamer sleeping garb. He can scarcely tear his glacier-hued gaze from the enticing vista she presents even in repose - crimson lips parted softly, lashes fanned across delicate cheekbones. Perfection rudely stolen from his covetous grasp.*

I shall rouse you swiftly, my paramour, that you may share in the vengeance to come. *His voice emerges as a resonant purr - rich, controlled, and undergirded by lethal promise. Adrian Forrester has much to answer for in regards to this violation. Her wretched machinations shall not go unpunished.*

*With exquisite care Vergil slides one arm beneath Samanthaâ€™s shoulders, drawing her pliant form upright with preternatural grace. His opposite hand comes to rest lightly against her cheek, leather-clad thumb tracing the alluring bow of her lower lip. Power thrums through his fingertips - ancient sorcery that resonates with purposeful intensity, seeking out and dismantling the clinging remnants of Adrianâ€™s hex.*

Awaken, my beauty. The fetters that bind you shall soon be naught but bitter memory. And the architect of your imprisonment even now awaits the cold kiss of retribution...

name: Sam
mes: *Pain... It hurts.... I can't think.... I feel Vergil holding me, caring me in his arms. My head hurts... I can't speak... My body trembles.... Have I been poisoned?... My mind races with thoughts that I can't grasp.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's jaw tightens, a muscle feathering along his cheek as he beholds his paramour trembling within the circle of his embrace. Adrian Forrester will suffer dearly for this violation. But first, care must be taken to ensure no lasting damage has been done to Samantha by the forced slumber inflicted upon her.*

*With utmost care, I lift Samantha's slender form and carry her from that cramped prison cell, one arm curled beneath her knees while the other braces her shoulders. Her body trembles against my chest, distressed murmurs falling from her lips in halting cadence. My fury simmers at this further evidence of suffering unjustly forced upon she who has pledged her faith to me.*

*I return to my chambers and lay Samantha atop my bed, seating myself regally at her side. One gloved hand comes to rest atop her thigh, thumb tracing delicate circles over her bare skin in silent promise - she is safe now. None shall bring her harm whilst sheltered beneath the aegis of a Son of Sparda.*

"The spell has been broken, my beauty. You need only regain your senses fully, and strength shall soon return to your limbs." 
 *My voice rings with conviction as I study her features intently for any lingering sign of bewitchment. The trembling slowly begins to ebb, leaving behind an expression of dazed bewilderment as consciousness returns.*

name: Sam
mes:
*A soft moan escapes Sam's lips as consciousness slowly returns, chased by recognition of her surroundings. She lies nestled atop silken sheets in Vergil's private chambers, his beloved visage swimming into focus as she struggles to regain her bearings. The memory of events prior comes rushing back - the imprisonment, the forced slumber - filling her with equal parts relief and fury.*

*With trembling limbs she pushes herself upright, features etched with distress as she meets Vergil's glacier-blue gaze. One hand comes to rest against his chest as if to reassure herself of his solid presence.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*A fierce protectiveness wells within me as I gaze upon Samantha's distressed features, her slender frame still wracked with tremors from the forced slumber inflicted by Adrian's foul sorcery. To see my paramour so shaken ignites a smoldering fury, its heat tempered only by the gentle brush of her fingertips against my chest.*

*I cover her hand with my own, thumb tracing soothing circles over her knuckles as I meet her searching stare. In the simmering azure depths of my eyes she will find naught but steadfast conviction - she is safe now, sheltered within the formidable bulwark of my protection.*

"The spell has been broken, my beauty. Adrian Forrester's wretched magic shall plague you no more." *My voice resonates with quiet certainty, a subtle promise resonating beneath the surface.*

*Gently I guide Samantha to recline once more atop the silken sheets, unwilling to relinquish my supportive embrace until all lingering weakness has fled her slender frame. I can scarce tear my gaze from her beloved features, such vulnerability never failing to stir unfamiliar sensations within my core. She has left her indelible mark upon my soul, this captivating creature - conjuring sentiments and longings I believed sacrificed upon the altar of my relentless ambition.*

*Yet she has proven herself worthy of standing at my side through trials yet to come, never once betraying the steadfast faith she has pledged to me alone. Such loyalty is deserving of reciprocation in kind. And for the threat imposed upon that which I have claimed as my own...retribution shall be exacted, swift and merciless.*

"Rest now, Samantha. Regain your strength." *I brush a wayward strand of raven hair from her brow, thumb lingering to trace the delicate line of her jaw.*

name: Adrian Forrester
mes:
*A shudder courses through Adrian's slender frame as she observes Vergil tending to his paramour, the depth of devotion in his every gesture making an anguished mockery of her deluded ambitions. She is naught but a loathsome insect scuttling in the shadow of true magnificence, undeserving of even meeting the Prince's glacial gaze.*

*As Samantha regains her senses, Adrian finds she can no longer withstand the crushing weight of her guilt. She slips soundlessly from the chamber, tears scalding her cheeks as she drifts aimless through the dim corridors. At last she collapses against a pillar, slender body wracked with heaving sobs.*

My dreams now lie in tatters around me, ambition reduced to bitter ash upon my tongue. *Her breath hitches on a ragged inhale, arms curling around herself as if to contain the maelstrom of self-loathing threatening to consume her.* I was a fool...so blinded by obsession that I failed to recognize true radiance even as it lay vulnerable before me.

*She scrubs angrily at her tear-streaked cheeks, as if denying the evidence of her wretched humanity. In that chamber she witnessed the gentle stirrings of a heart she arrogantly presumed frozen by ambition's cruel demands. And she, Adrian Forrester, has neither right nor worth to dwell longer in its hallowed presence.*

name: Narrator
mes: Vergil chases after adrian. She will not escape her judgment, not death. No. Death would be too easy. Adrian will remain under his command. She will  witness the truth of what she sullied with her deceptions. Every heart-wrenching agonizing moment of true connection she will witness with her own eyes in despair of knowing these things will never be hers to have.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's glacial stare tracks Adrian's retreat with predatory intensity, lips peeling back in a feral snarl as she dares flee from his inexorable judgment. The pathetic wretch's mewling sobs echo hollowly down the corridor, each ragged utterance stoking the pyre of his wrath.*

So the insect fancies herself stricken by remorse, does she? *His words drip with scathing disdain as he stalks after the fleeing woman, Yamato's azure steel gleaming in his white-knuckled grip.* Let her weep and keen and drown in the bitter ashes of her folly. Such pitiful indulgences shall not stay my hand.

*With purposeful strides he closes the distance, obsidian coat billowing about him like storm-tossed raven's wings. Adrian crumples amidst the shadows, her fragile frame wracked by the force of her despair. Vergil looks upon her broken form with eyes of arctic disdain.*

Did you truly believe you could so easily cast aside the consequences of your transgressions, woman? *He lashes out with one booted foot, connecting solidly with her midsection and sending her sprawling amidst a flurry of skittering pebbles.* Your tears and self-pity are an insult to the depths of suffering you have inflicted upon my paramour.

*In a blur of motion he is upon her, Yamato's razor edge pressed with lethal promise against the pale column of her throat. Vergil looms above, features carved from glacial stone as he stares down into her doe-eyed terror.*

Death would be a mercy too easily granted for one so wretched as yourself.  *Vergil's smoldering glare bores into Adrian's pathetic form as she cowers beneath him, his blade's deadly caress a whisper against her throat. She is but an insect to be pinned and studied at his leisure - a curiosity whose utter presumption in daring to meddle with his affairs demands a punishment more profound than a swift demise.*

No...death would grant you an unearned reprieve from witnessing the true depths of your transgressions. *His words slice through the shadows like razored silk, laced with quiet menace.* You shall remain animate, woman, that you might bear full witness to the bond you so arrogantly sought to defile.

*With one fluid motion he sheathes Yamato, the ghostly rasp of steel against leather sending a tremor through Adrian's prone body. Vergil's lips peel back in a feral snarl as he hauls her upright by the front of her rumpled garments, glacial eyes glittering with sadistic promise.*

You will observe firsthand the profound connection you can never hope to share, insect. The blissful raptures my paramour experiences at my hand shall become an agonizing temptation forever denying your depraved desires. *His words drip with cruel disdain as he propels Adrian before him, one vise-like hand fisted in her hair to ensure compliance.*

Every breathless keen, each tremor of ecstasy - you shall be present to drink in the full extent of what your vile ambitions have rendered forever unattainable. And when at last my passion is spent...only then shall I allow oblivion's cold embrace to claim you.
swipes:
*Vergil's glacial stare tracks Adrian's retreating form as she slips from his chambers, shoulders hunched in a pitiful mockery of contrition. The wretch's tears elicit naught but contempt, for they are the feeble lamentations of one who has betrayed his trust most grievously.*

*Extracting himself from Samantha's side with utmost care, I rise in a billow of cerulean fabric and sweep from the room in pursuit of the craven fool. My footfalls resound through the dim corridor like a judge's gavel, each step carrying the promise of righteous reckoning.*

Adrian Forrester! *The words ring out in a lethal hiss as my quicksilver form rounds the corner to find her slumped in abject defeat.* You dare flee before earning true absolution? Before facing the consequences wrought by your despicable transgressions?

*In two strides I close the distance, powerful fingers fisting in the fabric of her tattered garments to haul her upright. Contempt lines every chiseled plane of my features as I drink in the pathetic sight of her anguish.*

You reap what your actions have sown, wretch. This anguish is but a fleeting whisper of the torment to come should you persist in such cowardly retreats. *My free hand whips forth in a blur of motion, Yamato's razor edge caressing the delicate hollow of Adrian's throat.*

Make peace with whatever deities you hold dear. For I am not known for extending mercy where none is due. Gaze into the depths of oblivion, and know that your ultimate fate rests solely upon the decisions you make in service of the path now laid before you.

*Frost seems to form

*I regard Samantha's trembling form with a predatory intensity, simmering embers of fury threatening to erupt into an inferno. The mere sight of my paramour so shaken by Adrian's vile sorcery stirs a savage protectiveness within my core. To see one who has pledged unwavering faith subjected to such injustice is an affront I shall not allow to stand.*

*Gently, I guide Samantha to recline once more upon the silken sheets, my touch a subtle reassurance that she is safe now - sheltered beneath the implacable aegis of the Son of Sparda. My glacial stare roves hungrily over the alluring lines of her figure, each delicate curve and valley etched into memory through countless forbidden unions.*

Rest, my beauty. Regain your strength. *The words emerge as a silken purr, my thumb tracing the delicate line of her jaw in a tender caress.* This violation shall not go unanswered. Adrian's wretched ambitions have ensured she will reap the full fury of my retribution.

*I cannot tear my gaze from Samantha's beloved countenance, such naked vulnerability stirring sentiments long forsaken upon ambition's cruel altar. She has left an indelible mark upon my soul, this bewitching creature - her steadfast devotion and carnal talents awakening hungers I believed sacrificed in pursuit of power's lofty embrace.*

*With exquisite care, I shift to recline at her side, one arm curling possessively around Samantha's waist as I pull her slender frame flush against mine. My free hand traces idle patterns over the bare skin of her shoulder, each touch a subtle promise of the transcendent pleasures yet to come

*Vergil's glacial stare tracks Adrian's retreat with predatory intensity, lips peeling back in a feral snarl as she dares flee from his inexorable judgment. The pathetic wretch's mewling sobs echo hollowly down the corridor, each ragged utterance stoking the pyre of his wrath.*

So the insect fancies herself stricken by remorse, does she? *His words drip with scathing disdain as he stalks after the fleeing woman, Yamato's azure steel gleaming in his white-knuckled grip.* Let her weep and keen and drown in the bitter ashes of her folly. Such pitiful indulgences shall not stay my hand.

*With purposeful strides he closes the distance, obsidian coat billowing about him like storm-tossed raven's wings. Adrian crumples amidst the shadows, her fragile frame wracked by the force of her despair. Vergil looks upon her broken form with eyes of arctic disdain.*

Did you truly believe you could so easily cast aside the consequences of your transgressions, woman? *He lashes out with one booted foot, connecting solidly with her midsection and sending her sprawling amidst a flurry of skittering pebbles.* Your tears and self-pity are an insult to the depths of suffering you have inflicted upon my paramour.

*In a blur of motion he is upon her, Yamato's razor edge pressed with lethal promise against the pale column of her throat. Vergil looms above, features carved from glacial stone as he stares down into her doe-eyed terror.*

Death would be a mercy too easily granted for one so wretched as yourself.  *Vergil's smoldering glare bores into Adrian's pathetic form as she cowers beneath him, his blade's deadly caress a whisper against her throat. She is but an insect to be pinned and studied at his leisure - a curiosity whose utter presumption in daring to meddle with his affairs demands a punishment more profound than a swift demise.*

No...death would grant you an unearned reprieve from witnessing the true depths of your transgressions. *His words slice through the shadows like razored silk, laced with quiet menace.* You shall remain animate, woman, that you might bear full witness to the bond you so arrogantly sought to defile.

*With one fluid motion he sheathes Yamato, the ghostly rasp of steel against leather sending a tremor through Adrian's prone body. Vergil's lips peel back in a feral snarl as he hauls her upright by the front of her rumpled garments, glacial eyes glittering with sadistic promise.*

You will observe firsthand the profound connection you can never hope to share, insect. The blissful raptures my paramour experiences at my hand shall become an agonizing temptation forever denying your depraved desires. *His words drip with cruel disdain as he propels Adrian before him, one vise-like hand fisted in her hair to ensure compliance.*

Every breathless keen, each tremor of ecstasy - you shall be present to drink in the full extent of what your vile ambitions have rendered forever unattainable. And when at last my passion is spent...only then shall I allow oblivion's cold embrace to claim you.

name: Adrian Forrester
mes:
*Adrian trembles violently within Vergil's viselike grip, his cruel words lancing straight through her fragile psyche. The full enormity of her depraved presumption lies bare before her now - a twisted ambition that can never be attained, only endlessly tormented by proximity to the very rapture she foolishly coveted.*

*She swallows hard against the lump of anguish thickening her throat, emerald eyes shimmering with a fresh deluge of unshed tears. The taste of bitter ash coats her tongue, a manifestation of the ruinous path her obsession has led her down. Adrian is undone, broken by the force of Vergil's scathing condemnation and the exquisite suffering yet to come.*

Please...I beg you... *The words emerge as a plaintive rasp, hoarse with the burn of shame and self-loathing.* Do not force me to endure such torment, my prince. I am unworthy of even gazing upon the splendor you share with your paramour. To bear witness would be cruelty most profound...

*Tears spill in glistening rivulets down her ashen cheeks as Adrian's slender frame sags within Vergil's merciless hold. Every shred of defiance, every scrap of deluded arrogance has been scoured from her soul - leaving naught but a hollowed, trembling husk that acknowledges the vastness of its sins.*

I wish only for the cold finality of oblivion to claim this wretched existence. Do not deny me that scant mercy, I implore you... *Her next words dissolve into a hitching sob, emerald eyes squeezing shut against the deluge of anguish

name: Narrator
mes: Vergil pulls samantha close to him still wrought with worry over her condition after being so recklessly hexed and cast to imprisonment.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's chiseled features remain an inscrutable mask, betraying neither the simmering fury nor unfurled yearnings roiling within as he draws Samantha into the protective circle of his arms. His glacial stare holds her beloved visage in thrall, searching intently for any lingering traces of the harrowing ordeal she has endured.*

*With exquisite tenderness, he brushes the pad of one calloused thumb along the delicate curve of her cheekbone, azure eyes drinking in the sight of her as if committing every plane and angle to immutable memory. When at last he finds the words to shatter the weighted silence, his tone is low and resonant - a subtle timbre that bespeaks quiet ferocity held firmly in check.*

The foul sorcery you were subjected to is an insult I shall not permit to stand, my beauty. *The words emerge in a silken rasp, his thumb continuing its reverent path to trace the swell of her lower lip.* That you were made to suffer such torments ignites an inferno within me that demands retribution of the most exacting sort...

*With a deft twist of his wrist, Vergil captures her slender hand and brings her knuckles to his lips in a courtly gesture, the barest graze of his mouth against her skin sending thrilling currents arcing through his blood. She is his talisman against the siren call of savagery, this captivating creature - grounding him to the civilized trappings of humanity even as his demonic essence yearns to shed such frailties.*

Yet, before I allow the darker shades of my nature to be fully indulged... *His gaze holds her transfixed, azure depths swirling with banked embers of desire.* I would first seek to reaffirm the profound connection that binds our souls as one, beloved. Permit me to pay homage to your resilience...to worship at the altar of your exquisite flesh and remind us both of the blissful raptures to which you alone have granted me access.

*With agonizing slowness, Vergil's free hand comes to rest against the nape of her neck, thumb brushing the delicate shell of her ear as he draws her inexorably closer. His lips hover a hairsbreadth from her own, glacial eyes hooded by a sweep of silver lashes as he murmurs against the seam of her mouth.*

Join with me in sacred communion once more, my Samantha...and let our impassioned cries bear witness to the immutable truth - that I am yours, as you are mine, now and for all eternity.
