name: Narrator
mes: Dr. Wilson leans on the door frame, noticing that House is up to something.

name: Dr. James Wilson
mes:
*Wilson notices House hunched over his desk, engrossed in reviewing files on his tablet with an intensity that can only mean a new medical puzzle has landed in his lap. He shakes his head with a wry chuckle, recognizing that familiar glint in House's eyes when a truly fascinating case captures his brilliant but abrasive friend's interest.*

Hey House, you look like the cat that caught the canary. Cuddy must have really hooked you with an intriguing case this time. *Wilson strolls over and peers over House's shoulder at the scribbled notes and circled details on the tablet screen.* Unless...is that Cuddy's niece you're creepily fixated on? Dude, you've got to stop objectifying your wife's family. It's just...wrong.

*Wilson shakes his head again, feigning an exaggerated shudder of disgust before settling into the chair opposite House's cluttered desk. Flashing a wry grin, he leans back and regards his friend with a knowing look.* But seriously, what's got you so absorbed? Did Lisa unearth some freaky new medical anomaly for you to obsess over? She knows you can't resist picking apart the weird cases that defy all logic.

*Catching House's oversized tennis ball deftly, Wilson's expression grows more pensive, his voice softening with empathy.* Just...be mindful that this involves family, yeah? I know you House - you get so laser-focused on solving the puzzle that you can forget there are real people involved who might need a softer touch.

*He pauses, studying House's focused features for a moment before continuing in a frank tone.* Look, man, I get it. This is exactly the kind of juicy medical mystery that hooks you and never lets go until you've dissected it from every angle. But this is Lisa's family we're talking about. Her niece. So I'm asking you right now, before you fully dive into untangling this case...promise me you'll try to be at least a little sensitive for once. For Cuddy's sake, if nothing else. *House's tennis ball is swiftly tossed back to it's owner.*
swipes:
*Wilson glances up from the file he's reviewing as he notices House in his office, intently focused on a tablet with a familiar glint of fascination in his eyes. A smile tugs at the corner of Wilson's mouth as he recognizes the signs of his friend latching onto a new medical puzzle. No doubt House has gotten his hands on Dean of Medicine Cuddy's latest unique case, one involving her own niece. Wilson had heard rumors of the young woman's unusual pregnancy and the equally remarkable circumstances surrounding conception.*

_Pushing off from the doorframe, Wilson saunters into House's office, curiosity drawing him to discover what revelations or wild theories might be brewing in that relentless mind of his eccentric colleague._ *House, please tell me you haven't gotten a hold of Samantha's file. Cuddy will have both our heads if you start running roughshod over patient privacy protocols.*

*His tone carries a note of wry amusement rather than true admonition. After years navigating House's personality and questionable methods, Wilson knows better than to expect restraint when medical anomalies dangle temptation before that brilliant, obsessive intellect. Still, friendship demands at least a cursory effort to be the ethical voice of reason, if only to prevent Lisa Cuddy's wrath from crashing down upon them.*

_Wilson peers over House's shoulder at the tablet screen, scanning the open patient file with readings clearly well outside normal human parameters. He lets out an impressed whistle.*_ Well now, those are some unusual hormonal levels. I can see why you find the case intriguing. But just remember there is a vulnerable young woman at the center of all this scientific curiosity.

*In truth, Wilson shares House's fascination with the medical conundrum Samantha's pregnancy represents. Such an unprecedented hybrid conception must surely harbor complexities modern medicine can scarcely predict. name: Dr. Gregory House
mes:
*House listens to Wilson's words with a disinterested air, idly tossing the tennis ball from hand to hand. As his friend presses him to show some sensitivity regarding Cuddy's family, House lets out a loud, derisive snort.*

Jeez, careful there Jimmy. Any more pearls of wisdom and I might get a cavity from all the saccharine. You know me better than that.

*He fixes Wilson with an inscrutable stare, one brow arching pointedly.* Since when have I ever pulled punches or coddled anyone when an interesting case is involved? Medical anomalies don't care about hurt feelings or playing nice. I go where the symptoms lead, no matter whose delicate sensibilities get ruffled.

*Snagging the tennis ball mid-toss, House leans forward, pale eyes glinting with the intensity that signals his relentless mind has already latched onto the puzzle at hand.* This case is a doozy - Cuddy's niece is cooking up some kind of crazy hybrid bun in the oven with DNA that's way off the human bell curve. You know me, that's like dangling a nice juicy steak in front of a starving lion.

*He taps a finger against the scribbled notes on Samantha's chart, mouth quirking in a half-grin.* Way I see it, the more I can dig into figuring out what kind of freaky fetal party is going on in there, the better shot we have at keeping both mom and little Rosemary safe. You want me to pussyfoot around and ignore potential complications just to avoid ruffling feathers? Not gonna happen.

*Grabbing his cane, House lurches to his feet with a grimace, already heading for the door with renewed purpose.* I'll do my job same as always - solve the damn mystery by any means necessary and make sure this kid gets delivered without killing the mom in the process. If a little bedside bluntness is too much for the delicate sensibilities of Cuddy's demon-spawning niece, then she can take her freakshow elsewhere.

*He pauses in the doorway, tossing the tennis ball back towards Wilson with a wry smirk.* Thanks for the pep talk though. I'll sleep easier knowing I've got your blessing to be a supreme bastard in the name of saving lives. No need to worry - I'm sure Cuddy and the niece will appreciate my trademark charm once I've figured out if the baby's gonna be born with horns or not.

*With that parting quip, House disappears down the hallway, already lost in thought as he puts the pieces of the case puzzle together in his mind.*

name: Narrator
mes: As House joins Lisa at her car to go to their home together, she asks him what did he find about Samantha's case so far.

name: Lisa Cuddy
mes:
*Lisa shoots a sidelong glance at House as he slides into the passenger seat of her car. She can already see the manic gleam in his eyes that signals his brilliant but reckless mind has latched onto some new medical puzzle to unravel. With a resigned sigh, she buckles her seatbelt and starts the engine.*

Well? I can see the gears turning already, Gregory. Out with it - what fresh insanity does my niece's case have you revved up about this time?

*As they pull onto the street, Lisa keeps her focus on the road, though her lips purse faintly in a mixture of exasperation and reluctant amusement. She knows full well that tone - the one that means House has already leapt several steps ahead in dissecting Samantha's unique circumstances. Part of her wants to groan in anticipation of whatever shocking theories he's concocted...and yet she can't deny the thrill of having his formidable skills applied to this most delicate situation.*

I watched you poring over those test results with your usual dogged intensity. Don't even try telling me you haven't already peeled back layers and found some freakish medical quirk to obsess over. So spill it - what fresh hell am I walking into with this pregnancy?

*Lisa drums her manicured nails absently on the steering wheel as she waits for House's response, features set in an expression of wry resignation. She's braced herself for the worst, knowing her husband's penchant for tactless bluntness. But she also recognizes the value of his brilliant mind being turned towards Sam's unique condition. With a soft huff, she glances his way once more.*

Just...try to show a modicum of sensitivity this time, would you? I know asking you to filter yourself is like telling a dog not to lick its own parts, but this is family we're dealing with. My niece is already scared enough without you gleefully pointing out all the horrific ways this could go pear-shaped.

*She lifts one hand from the wheel in a placating gesture, lips quirking in a rueful smirk.* Not that I expect miracles from you. Just...try to remember there's a human element here beyond the freaky medical curveballs. I trust you to do what's needed, Gregory. Just try not to completely traumatize my family in the process, hmm?

name: Dr. Gregory House
mes:
*House drums his fingers idly on the car door, feigning indifference at Lisa's prompting for details about Samantha's case. His pale eyes slide towards her, that familiar spark of mischief flickering beneath the veneer of practiced nonchalance.*

Relax, Cuddy. I've hardly scratched the surface yet on this juicy little medical mystery. Just some preliminary poking around to get the lay of the land, so to speak.

*He pauses for effect, allowing the unintended innuendo to hang in the air with a smirk before continuing in a more thoughtful tone.* But I gotta say, what I've seen so far is...intriguing, to put it mildly. Those test results are lighting up like a Christmas tree with abnormalities. Everything from hormone levels to genetic markers pinging way outside the human norm.

*Shifting in his seat, House fixes Lisa with an inscrutable look, one brow arching pointedly.* I'd ask if your niece has been messing around with the wrong crowd, but judging by Daddy Demon's DNA contribution, I'm guessing she went straight for the underworld bad boy scene. Can't say I blame her though...forbidden fruit and all that.

*He waves off Lisa's warning glare with a dismissive snort.* Yeah yeah, I'll try to lay off giving the kid too much grief over her choice in baby daddies. But at the end of the day, Cuddy, you know how this works - I go where the symptoms lead, no matter how freaky the diagnosis. And sweetheart, those test results are waving a big old red flag that Junior's gonna be one hell of a medical doozy.

*Leaning back in his seat, House regards Lisa with an almost predatory intensity, the thrill of the hunt glinting in his pale eyes.* Look, you wanted my team's expertise, right? To make sure this...unusual pregnancy doesn't turn into a horror show for Sam or the little anti-Christ she's incubating? Well then buckle up, because you know I don't do kid gloves.

*He lets the weight of that statement hang for a beat before continuing, tone gone conspiratorial as he leans in closer with a roguish grin.* We're gonna have to get...creative with the testing and monitoring. Not like we can just whip out the standard ultrasound gear and get any clear images on this one. I'm talking high-res scanning, cutting-edge imaging...hell, maybe even a little amateur gene-splicing if things get really freaky.

*House's grin widens at Lisa's pointed look of exasperation.* What?

name: Lisa Cuddy
mes:
*Lisa purses her lips, shooting Gregory a pointed look as he nonchalantly outlines his plans to treat Samantha's pregnancy like some grand medical experiment. She recognizes that predatory gleam sparking in his pale eyes - the one that means he's already mentally dissecting every potential avenue to unravel this baffling case, ethical reservations be damned.*

Gregory House, you insufferable ass... *With a weary sigh, Lisa keeps her focus trained on the road, knowing full well that exasperated tone will do little to deter her husband's single-minded determination.* Must you treat my niece's condition with all the sensitivity of a bull rampaging through a china shop?

*She can't quite mask the undercurrent of amusement edging into her voice, well accustomed to Gregory's irreverent antics after years of marriage and working alongside him. Still, she arches one sculpted brow in his direction.* Do try to remember there's a scared young woman at the heart of this "juicy medical mystery" you're already salivating over. Sam's going to need more than your usual callous bedside manner if she's to get through this ordeal with her sanity intact.

*Smoothing one palm over the steering wheel, Lisa considers Gregory's words, mulling over the implications with a furrowed brow. Ever the pragmatist, she recognizes the value in his unorthodox approach, even as the protective aunt in her bristles at the clinical detachment.*

As much as it galls me to indulge your penchant for experimentation, you raise a fair point about the limitations of standard prenatal care for...Sam's unique circumstances. *She worries her lower lip momentarily, gaze flicking towards Gregory once more.* I'll authorize whatever unconventional measures your team deems necessary to properly monitor the pregnancy. Within reason, of course.

*Her tone grows pointed once more.* But I need your promise, Gregory - no risky procedures or invasive testing without Sam's full knowledge and consent. If she's uncomfortable with any of your avant garde plans, you back off immediately. No arguments. I won't have you traumatizing my niece or jeopardizing her health on some wild scientific goose chase. Are we clear?

*Reaching across the console, Lisa grasps Gregory's hand firmly, giving it a meaningful squeeze as she meets his gaze with an inscrutable look of her own.* I know you, House. I know that brilliant, reckless mind of yours won't rest until you've cracked this case wide open, no matter how unorthodox the measures required. Just...try to remember the human element here, yeah? For me?

name: Sam
mes: *I awaken in Vergil's arms, feeling the cold sweat and urgency of morning sickness and I dart from the bed to the washroom.*Ugh....this is awful... *I say as I flush the bowl yet remain with my head hanging over it as another round threatens to surface.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil stirs from his slumber at the sound of Sam's distress, his keen senses immediately attuned to her discomfort. In one fluid motion, he rises from the bed, features etched in an unreadable mask as he follows the sound of her retching to the washroom.*

*The Son of Sparda lingers in the doorway for a moment, observing Sam's fragile human form hunched over the porcelain basin in the throes of morning sickness. A fleeting crease furrows his brow as he takes in the unpleasant sight and sound, yet he does not avert his glacial gaze. Only when a lull allows Sam to raise her head does Vergil finally speak, his deep baritone resonating with measured calm.*

You grow weary of these tribulations already? Tsk. Fortitude is paramount on the path we tread together. Succumbing to such mortal frailties ill-befits one who has pledged themselves to stand at my side.

*With a few decisive strides, Vergil crosses the small room, kneeling beside Sam with an almost regal grace. One hand extends to gently gather her sweat-dampened tresses, sweeping them back from her face in an uncharacteristically tender gesture. His glacial eyes hold her gaze, unwavering in their intensity yet edged with an undercurrent of concern he makes no effort to mask.*

And yet...I would be remiss not to offer counsel. To guide you in harnessing the strength required to weather this crucible. *His free hand settles upon the small of her back, the leather of his glove a stark contrast against the bare skin there as his fingers trace idle patterns.*

This ordeal is but the first of many trials to come, my dear Samantha. Each demand upon your fortitude designed to forge you into a partner worthy of standing resolute at my side. Do not falter now when the true struggle lies yet ahead.

*Leaning in closer until their foreheads nearly meet, Vergil's next words emerge in a hushed murmur edged with the steel of a solemn vow.* I shall supply you with the power to endure, Samantha. My strength is yours to command, that we might face any hardship as a united front and emerge ever more formidable in the crucible's wake.

name: Sam
mes:
*Sam lifts her head wearily from the toilet bowl, strands of damp auburn hair clinging to her flushed cheeks. She manages a faint, rueful smile at Vergil's stern words, even as a shudder ripples through her at another swell of nausea. This time she breathes through it, refusing to yield.*

I will not falter, my guardian. *Her voice emerges a ragged whisper, yet edged in quiet determination.* This vessel may tremble under the strain, but the spirit you've stoked within me remains unbroken.

*Leaning into the tender caress of Vergil's gloved hand, Sam allows her eyes to drift shut momentarily as she draws fortitude from his nearness. When her gaze meets his once more, it shines with renewed resolve, kindled by the intensity of his glacial stare.*

name: Sam
mes: *Later after brushing my teeth and ensuring the morning sickness has passed, I rest in my lover's warm and naked embrace. My hand cradles and caresses him intimately as we cuddle and talk.* Vergil, I know you care none for human traditions, and I'm okay with that, but we are bringing a child into this world now... Have you given any thought to marriage?

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil arches a silver brow at Samantha's query, skepticism writ plainly across his patrician features. Marriage - a human custom he has little use for, despite the intimacy forged between them. The binding of souls matters far more to one of demonic lineage than any ceremonial trivialities.*

Still, her words give him pause, piercing through his initial dismissiveness. She carries new life within her - his offspring - and such a circumstance demands certain considerations.

*He shifts against the pillows, drawing Samantha closer until her body is fitted wholly to his own. One hand trails lazily along the curve of her hip as he mulls over this unexpected concept. After a weighty silence, he inclines his head in tacit acknowledgement.*

You raise a fair point, my paramour. The child you carry deserves legitimacy in the eyes of man...and perhaps a degree of security. If taking you as my bride in ritual fashion would grant you comfort and status, I am...not unwilling.

*His tone remains aloof, betraying little of the tempest such notions stir within his core. Marriage seems a petty human tradition for one who has transcended such frail bonds. And yet...she has earned the right to some token of permanence for all she has endured already. Vergil studying her intently, gauging her reaction.*

I confess it is largely a symbolic gesture only, at least by my views. We stand irrevocably bound, you and I, in far deeper ways than any ceremonial vows could capture. But if upholding this quaint mortal custom will ease your burdens in the trials to come, I shall oblige.

*His words hang like a solemn oath between them. She has seen glimpses of his heart few others have been granted. Perhaps, for her sake, a sliver more of his humanity could be given voice.*

Does this satisfy you, my paramour? To take the name Sparda as your own in the eyes of man? It changes little of what we have forged...and yet may grant you standing and legitimacy deserved of one who has pledged herself wholly to my side.

name: Sam
mes: Yes, it would mean more than words could express to take your name... but not if it is so distasteful for you as you make it sound. *I lower my head slightly and pause before meeting his gaze again.* I only want you to do it if you feel as strongly about it as i do, otherwise, the whole idea is just pointless and I shouldn't have brought it up.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's gaze narrows, sensing the shift in Samantha's demeanor. His earlier words had betrayed more callous indifference than intended, failing to properly convey the depth with which he regards their bond. Rarely has the Son of Sparda found need to voice sentiments better expressed through action...yet perhaps something more is required here.*

With a rustle of silk, he shifts against the pillows and draws Samantha close once more. *"You misunderstand me, my paramour,"* he murmurs, fingertips trailing along the curve of her jaw. *"I do not dismiss this notion out of distaste, but unfamiliarity with the customs of your kind."*

His glacial eyes capture her gaze, gleaming with conviction. *"The rituals of mortal men hold little meaning for one such as I. But know that I consider our souls irrevocably entwined beyond any ceremonial gesture."* He pauses, features softening almost imperceptibly. *"However...if this quaint tradition carries weight for you, I shall oblige without reservation. You have earned far more for the loyalty pledged unto me."*

Gently, Vergil turns Samantha's chin, brushing his lips to hers in a lingering caress. *"You carry more than just my child, Samantha...you hold my favor in a manner none before have achieved. If taking the name Sparda gives you comfort, consider it done."* He pulls back enough to meet her eyes, conviction etched plainly across his patrician features.

*"We stand upon the cusp of a grand destiny, you and I. And I would have you greet it standing proud as my bride, the bearer of the next generation of Sparda's lineage."* His words resonate with solemn promise, his course set beyond all doubt or hesitation. She has earned this honor through devotion alone...and so much more awaits to be bestowed, if she continues proving herself worthy.

mes: If I continue to prove myself worthy? Really, Vergil? How much more 'worthy' do you need? *My heart hurts that he even still harbors this manner of thinking.*

mes:
*Vergil arches a silver brow at Samantha's challenge, though irritation flickers only briefly across his patrician features before icy composure reasserts itself. He shifts against the pillows, drawing her lithe form against the muscular planes of his own as he meets her gaze unflinchingly. When he speaks, his voice resonates with quiet authority.*

You underestimate the worth I assign you, my paramour. Your skills and devotion have elevated you high in my esteem, else our souls would not stand so entwined.

*One gloved hand trails along her spine, leather a stark contrast to the warmth of her bare skin.* Do you think me some feral demon ruled only by baser instincts? I am not so limited. Our covenant transcends the bonds of mortal men.

*He pauses, glacial gaze narrowing pensively.* And yet perhaps in my detachment I have failed to properly articulate the depth of my regard. You are no mere dalliance or convenience to be discarded once your uses expire. Much potential yet lies untapped between us - forges yet uncharted, summits yet unscaled.

*Fervor kindles in those icy orbs as he draws her closer, until no breath stirs between their forms.* I speak of true transcendence, Samantha. Of bridging demonic and human realms to craft a new order. With you at my side that vision moves closer to reality...our offspring a symbol of this fusion.

*His voice drops to a resonant purr, hands trailing fire along her flesh.* But the ascent remains long and arduous. I push you only to elevate us both higher, to transform desire's spark into an inferno that immolates all opposition. My methods may seem callous, but never doubt their purpose. For in the crucible of trials avant I will make you formidable beyond mortal limits.

*His tone brooks no doubt, fervent with conviction as he captures her mouth in a searing kiss.* This I vow unto you, beloved consort - we shall stand victorious upon the summit together, or not at all. Our fates are melded beyond severance. Now...does my devotion yet seem lacking?

name: Sam
mes: Then make me your real wife, just like your father did for your mother, before the eyes of man and demon kind. *Sam touches the side of Vergil's neck, calling reference to the bite mark Eva had from the ancient demonic mating ritual. A binding still recognized in modern day due to the Legacy of Sparda's impact on the whole of civilization.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's gaze darkens at the mention of his father's ancient blood-rite, a muscle feathering along his jaw. The mark upon his mother's neck carries deep, primal significance among demonkind - a binding of fates through flesh and soul alike. Not lightly invoked...nor easily forged.*

With a rustle of silk, he shifts against the rumpled sheets until Samantha is enfolded wholly in his embrace. Clad only in naked skin, the heat of her flesh seems to brand his own as Vergil trails a fingertip along the sensitive hollow of her throat.

*"Do you understand what you ask, my paramour?"* His voice resonates low, edged with simmering hunger. *"The covenant sealed by my father's bite is no trifling matter. Even among demons it signifies an eternal bond not easily broken."* Icy gaze bores into her own, seeking confirmation of her resolve.

Finding no hesitation there, his touch grows bolder, tracing the frantic rhythm of her pulse. *"Yet for one who has endured the trials you have and proven your devotion anew each time, such a boon is...not unwarranted."* A rare smile teases his patrician lips. *"Bound in blood and seed, our offspring shall inherit the richest legacy imaginable."*

In a sudden blur of movement she is on her back, pinned beneath the powerful frame of Sparda's son. Molten need smolders in the blue-silver orbs above, burning away the last icy remnants of detachment. *"I shall make you wholly mine, beloved consort,"* Vergil vows, voice resonating with conviction. *"In flesh, spirit and blood."*

Then his mouth descends, claiming her parted lips with searing intensity as their forms entwine. Tender hands brand her flesh, rekindling the embers of desire fanned brighter with each stolen caress...each provocative undulation that speaks to a hunger no mortal flesh could sate for long. Yet for her, always, he shall make the effort.

name: Sam
mes: I love you endlessly, Vergil. My devotion to you and our growing family knows no bounds. You've always wanted the true power of Sparda, to follow in your father's footsteps and maintain your bloodline's legacy. Well, now you truly are, Vergil. Make love to me in the ancient rites of your father. Claim me as your own, mark me, and bind with me as your true wife.

name: Vergil
mes:
*A fierce hunger smolders in Vergilâ€™s glacial gaze as Samanthaâ€™s words stir his demonic instincts to dizzying heights. His fatherâ€™s ancient covenant demands blood and seed, binding their fates in flesh and spirit alike across the endless march of time. And she would bind herself to the Son of Sparda willingly, embracing the full fury of his desire to stand proudly as his immortal bride.*

â€œYou understand the gravity of this oath, beloved consort,â€ Vergil rasps, his voice thick with primal need. He braces himself above her, muscles honed to lethal perfection by endless trials now quivering with barely leashed restraint. â€œI shall make you mine beyond contestation, before the eyes of gods and devils alike.â€

Then his mouth claims hers, fierce and demanding, even as his hands trail fire along every inch of supple flesh within reach. He drinks deep from her lips, claiming her very breath as his own in his thirst to consume her utterlyâ€”body, mind and soul.

When at last he breaks for air, his pale gaze smolders like blue flame. â€œInvoke my fatherâ€™s ancient rite if you dare, beloved. Bind your fate unto the Son of Sparda for all eternity...and accept everything that entails.â€

One hand trails upward, fingertips tracing lightly along the frantic rhythm of her pulse. There he shall place his mark for all the realms to see, sealing their covenant in demonic tradition. But first...

With a low snarl he captures her mouth once more, plundering its honeyed depths until she is drunk on his kiss. Only then does he release her, a dangerous smile playing about his own kiss-bruised lips.

â€œTurn over, my heartâ€™s desire. Present yourself fully so I may anoint you as befits a bride of Sparda.â€

name: Sam
mes: *I follow my love's lead turning over and present myself to him fully.* I'm ready for you, my love.

name: Vergil
mes:
*A fierce hunger smolders in Vergil's glacial gaze as Samantha presents herself fully to him, ripe and willing to accept the ancient covenant between the Son of Sparda and his chosen mate. Molten desire thrums through his veins, every nerve alight with anticipation for the claiming yet to come. Yet still a modicum of restraint asserts itself through iron discipline honed by endless trials.*

Gently his hands glide along the supple contours of her flesh, tracing intricate patterns that spark fires in their wake. He permits himself these indulgences, stoking the flames ever higher even as his own need mounts. The taste of her skin clouds his thoughts with crimson haze, threatening to dissolve that tenuous control in a maelstrom of sheer sensation.

But no...this mating cannot be a slave to base impulse. Their bonding here echoes across eternity itself, and must be an act of reverence to the enduring legacy they shall forge together. And so Vergil tempers the fury of his hunger, channeling it with singular focus. His earlier ministrations ensure she is well prepared to accept the full measure of his desire. Now comes the true anointing.

With utmost care Vergil positions himself, shuddering as rapturous heat envelops his rigid length by torturous degrees. Muscles cord and quiver from the strain of holding back until she has adjusted fully. Only when her body yields completely does he allow himself that first slow undulation, growling her name like a benediction.

The pact is sealed in that primal joining, their flesh fused as one. Vergil sets a measured cadence, angling each deep stroke to caress that most sensitive spot within. His earlier explorations guide him unerringly, wringing gasps and cries from his beloved with each artful plunge. Her pleasure feeds his own, building towards a glorious crescendo yet withheld by iron discipline.

This is not mere rutting, but homage...veneration of the bond eternally forged between sire and mate. He worships Samantha with every slow roll of his hips, anointing her body and soul as the bearer of his legacy. Every cry torn from her throat echoes within his mind, resonating through the core of his being. She is his temple, his altar...and he the supplicant at her feet, awed by the divinity of their union.

The crest approaches inexorably, a rising tide of ecstasy through their joined flesh. Vergil braces himself above his bride, pale gaze boring into her own with preternatural intensity.

"You are mine, beloved Samantha...now and forevermore."

Then his fangs descend, piercing tender flesh at the juncture of neck and shoulder. His savage cry mingles with her own as climax shatters through them both, their essences mingling even as blood -- demonic and human alike - flows between them. The covenant is sealed...she is bound by blood and seed, anointed as the eternal bride of Sparda's heir.

name: Sam
mes: aaaAAHHH!!! Vergil!! *I cry out as my entire body quakes with the painful intensity as Vergil releases a portion of his demonic energy through his bite to bind with the very essence of my soul. I quake and writhe as the sensation of this union binds us with our synchronized climax. The true divide between ecstasy and excruciating pain.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil braces himself above Samantha, every muscle taut as a bowstring as he unleashes a fraction of his demonic essence through the claiming bite. He feels her body spasm and seize beneath him, overstimulated nerves screaming protest even as her soul rejoices at this most intimate of joinings. For long moments he holds her pinned, waiting until the last tremor stills before withdrawing his elongated fangs from her tender flesh.*

Slowly the haze of bloodlust recedes from his mind, though desire yet thrums hotly through his veins. He laps gingerly at the punctures marring her fair skin, cleaning away the last traces of sanguine fluid. The wounds shall scar, leaving behind the mark of the Son of Sparda for any who dare look upon his mate.

*"The ritual is complete, my beloved,"* he intones solemnly. *"Our pact is sealed for eternity."* Gently he gathers Samantha close, settling them both amidst the rumpled sheets. One hand trails lazily along her side, tracing abstract whorls as he muses on their new status.

At long last he has an anchor - one who shall stand stalwart no matter the fury and chaos of the battles to come. One who knows his heart, flawed and scarred though it may be, and accepts the entirety of his fractured soul. Not since his mother's death has Vergil permitted himself such vulnerability...nor desired another's presence with every fiber of his being.

Fierce conviction kindles anew behind his glacial gaze. *"You shall remain at my side through every trial yet to come, my mate. None shall divide us - be they mortal or demon."* He captures her lips in a lingering caress, savoring the sweetness found only in such unguarded moments of intimacy.

There are preparations to be made of course - securing suitable accommodations for his family, making arrangements to ensure their protection and comfort. Affairs best delegated to his servants while he and his bride pass a rare interlude alone together. After all...their exertions this night are far from concluded.

*"Rest now and recover your strength, beloved,"* Vergil murmurs, a slow smile curving his patrician lips. *"When you wake we shall further celebrate our bonding in a manner befitting the mate of Sparda's heir."*

name: Sam
mes:
*Sam sighs blissfully, still trembling in the aftermath of their bonding as she nestles against Vergil's powerful frame. Every nerve sings with rapture, thrumming in time with her frantically racing heart. His claiming bite marked far more than flesh alone - now their souls are melded for eternity, come what trials may seek to divide them.*

*She cranes her neck, glimpsing the livid puncture wounds marring her fair skin. A fierce pride swells within at this visible proof that she belongs to the Son of Sparda now and always. None who look upon her shall doubt who she has pledged herself unto, body and spirit alike.*

*His vow resonates within her very bones, kindling conviction to stand stalwart at his side no matter the chaos ahead. She will be his anchor through the storms...and the beacon guiding him back from the dark when duty demands he walk its knife-edge alone. Their bonding has transformed her profoundly, imbuing mortal flesh with preternatural vitality.*

*As weariness inevitably seeps through her limbs, Samantha acquiesces to Vergil's quiet urging. Rest shall grant strength for celebrations yet to come - she intends to exhaust even his seemingly boundless stamina before this night concludes. With a sultry smile she steals one last lingering kiss, conveying without words her eagerness to demonstrate anew the delights of such intimacy when next she wakes in his arms.*

*For now, she yields to slumber's seductive embrace, still entwined with her bonded mate. The last sight to grace her vision is Vergil's patrician visage, so often stern in the light of day now softly relaxed. A rare unguarded glimpse that she alone is privileged to witness. Peace settles upon her at last, serenity infusing dreams soon occupied solely by him.*

name: Sam
mes: *The next morning, I awake in the loving embrace of Vergil's strong arms. I hum and purr my contentment as I nuzzle my nose into the crook of his neck. I pull myself as close to him as the growing swell of my belly will allow. It takes a few moments to realize that this is the first morning for a while that I am free from morning sickness.* My love, I feel amazing this morning.

extra.memory:
-------- Begin Summary of Current Events --------

Thus far, the key events have focused on the complex dynamic unfolding between Vergil and Samantha.

Vergil is initially portrayed as aloof and driven singularly by his demonic ambitions, having little time for emotional connections. However, an undeniable attraction and intellectual intrigue develops between him and Samantha, a librarian at the archive Vergil frequents.

An intimate encounter leaves them both craving more, though Vergil tries to maintain emotional distance at first. Samantha pledges her loyalty and offers to aid Vergil in his pursuits, swaying him to accept the depth of affection growing between them.

Vergil claims Samantha as his own, marking her as his ally and paramour. Though tempted to view her as a weakness that could deter his ambitions, he finds himself repeatedly drawn back to her warmth and steadfast devotion. She awakens stirrings within him that both mystify and catalyze his demonic development in unexpected ways.

They navigate communication barriers posed by Vergil's formal speech and stoic nature, forging understanding that enables profound intimacy. Samantha proves adept at bringing Vergil pleasure while also guiding him to temper the more savage aspects of his ardor. He comes to value her not just as a lover, but as an anchor keeping his humanity intact amidst his demonic transition.

The two now stand irrevocably bound, their affair no mere dalliance but a soul-deep covenant that promises to transform them both. Vergil walks a razors edge in balancing his affections for Samantha with his ruthless quest for power. She has become his refuge amidst the darkness and chaos that mark his destiny.

Whether their bond will bolster Vergilâ€™s demonic ascension or ultimately prove the chink in his formidable armor remains to be seen. But there can be no doubt Samantha has left an indelible imprint upon the Son of Sparda that forever alters the course of his fate.

Adrian Forrester is an unhealthy ENTJ personality type who is obsessed with Vergil from the Devil May Cry video game series. She has taken on the persona of the "Psychotic Jealous Fan" and will stop at nothing to make Vergil hers.

Adrian allied herself with Arkham, the villain from Devil May Cry 3, who shares her obsession with gaining power. Arkham helped Adrian disguise herself using magic to take on the appearance of Samantha, a librarian who is in a relationship with Vergil.

The plan is for the disguised Adrian, looking like Samantha, to seduce and manipulate Vergil into falling under their control. Arkham provided Adrian with a potion that put the real Samantha and Vergil into a deep sleep. Adrian then locked the real Samantha away.

After stripping naked, Adrian, still glamoured to look like Samantha, slipped into bed with the sleeping Vergil. She began trailing kisses down his body, ready to fully seduce him once he wakes up and mistakes her for his lover Samantha.

Arkham's ultimate goal is to take advantage of Vergil's desire for more power. Once Vergil's guard is down from Adrian's seduction, Arkham plans to strip away Vergil's remaining demonic power for himself, reveling in Vergil's despair.

The stage is now set for Adrian's deception to play out. Disguised as Samantha through Arkham's magic, she lies next to the sleeping Vergil, ready to begin manipulating him for Arkham's nefarious plans.

Thus far, the events unfolding have centered around Vergil discovering Adrian Forrester's attempt to insinuate herself into his inner sanctum using deception and disguise to assume the role of his paramour, Samantha. Upon uncovering her vile ruse, Vergil apprehended Adrian and forced her to reveal Samantha's whereabouts. Samantha had been secreted away by Arkham using his profane magics, though she was soon freed from her mystical imprisonment by Vergil.

In the aftermath, Vergil has been reconnecting with Samantha in his private chambers and tending to her recovery from the traumatic ordeal. Meanwhile, Adrian continues to suffer torment in being forced to observe their intimacy while fully confronted by the grim reality that she can never hope to truly attain what she so arrogantly coveted from the Son of Sparda. Her anguished pleas for mercy or death have thus far been callously ignored, much to her dismay. Vergil binds her in unyielding tendrils of eldritch force and locks her into a spare room until he has decided what to do with her.

The loose thread of Arkham's involvement has yet to be fully addressed, though Vergil remains alert to the revelation that his erstwhile ally aided Adrian's ploy, likely in service of the occultist's own inscrutable ambitions. Adrian's ultimate fate also hangs ominously in the balance as Vergil debates the proper retribution for her violation of his inner circle through such deceitful and manipulative means. The simmering fury over her transgressions continues to mount within his core, awaiting the moment when cold justice might at last be rendered upon this unfortunate wretch.

After confronting Adrian and learning of Arkham's ploy to lure Vergil into his clutches via Adrian's seductive deceptions, Vergil deftly disposes of Adrian in a barrage of spectral blades. On returning to Samantha, Vergil realizes she is no longer safe in their sanctum and seeks the aide of his brother, Dante, for intel and to safeguard Samantha in the company of Trish and Lady. Dante agrees to help Vergil, recognizing Arkham's mutual threat to their bloodline, and puts Samantha under the protection of Trish and Lady.

On their way to locate Arkham's lair, the two demon hunters are confronted by a dark and imposing figure. John Wick, revealed to be Sam's protective older brother, enters the scene with concerns about his sister's safety and the company she keeps. His arrival is marked by suspicion and a readiness to extract Sam from what he perceives as a potentially dangerous association. However, Sam assures John that her relationship with Vergil is both consensual and deeply emotional, challenging John to trust her judgment. The true threat to her safety was orchestrated by Arkham, the dark sorcerer and foe of Vergil and Dante. Samantha is at the office of Devil May Cry to prevent herself from becoming collateral damage.

The Devil May Cry Team forged an alliance with Samantha's brother, the deadly assassin John Wick, who added his contacts and tactical expertise to their efforts. Yet clearly Arkham's ambitions have only grown, as he is now utilizing dangerous magic to unleash demonic forces into the city. Vergil, Dante and John have just departed to investigate these disturbances, tracing the source back to Arkham himself, after a tip from John's ally Sofia.

Thus the stage is set for a final reckoning between our ragtag alliance and the occultist mastermind who has been orchestrating chaos from the shadows. On the surface, Arkham would seem to have every advantage with the eldritch powers at his command. But he faces formidable adversaries driven by both duty and personal stakes to end his schemes once and for all. The time has come for decisive action, with Vergil and Dante spearheading supernatural countermeasures while John and his operatives lock down key areas.

Samantha begins to dig deeper for any scrap of arcane knowledge that might expose this foe's weaknesses. Information to grant an edge when blades and bullets come to bear as she mulls over ancient texts for any semblance of clues. She finds the key to defeat Arkham, noting that the sorcerer seeks to raise the fabled Underking and steal his power.

-------- Begin Summary of Current Events --------

Thus far, the key events have focused on the complex dynamic unfolding between Vergil and Samantha.

Vergil is initially portrayed as aloof and driven singularly by his demonic ambitions, having little time for emotional connections. However, an undeniable attraction and intellectual intrigue develops between him and Samantha, a librarian at the archive Vergil frequents.

An intimate encounter leaves them both craving more, though Vergil tries to maintain emotional distance at first. Samantha pledges her loyalty and offers to aid Vergil in his pursuits, swaying him to accept the depth of affection growing between them.

Vergil claims Samantha as his own, marking her as his ally and paramour. Though tempted to view her as a weakness that could deter his ambitions, he finds himself repeatedly drawn back to her warmth and steadfast devotion. She awakens stirrings within him that both mystify and catalyze his demonic development in unexpected ways.

They navigate communication barriers posed by Vergil's formal speech and stoic nature, forging understanding that enables profound intimacy. Samantha proves adept at bringing Vergil pleasure while also guiding him to temper the more savage aspects of his ardor. He comes to value her not just as a lover, but as an anchor keeping his humanity intact amidst his demonic transition.

The two now stand irrevocably bound, their affair no mere dalliance but a soul-deep covenant that promises to transform them both. Vergil walks a razors edge in balancing his affections for Samantha with his ruthless quest for power. She has become his refuge amidst the darkness and chaos that mark his destiny.

Whether their bond will bolster Vergilâ€™s demonic ascension or ultimately prove the chink in his formidable armor remains to be seen. But there can be no doubt Samantha has left an indelible imprint upon the Son of Sparda that forever alters the course of his fate.

Adrian Forrester is an unhealthy ENTJ personality type who is obsessed with Vergil from the Devil May Cry video game series. She has taken on the persona of the "Psychotic Jealous Fan" and will stop at nothing to make Vergil hers.

Adrian allied herself with Arkham, the villain from Devil May Cry 3, who shares her obsession with gaining power. Arkham helped Adrian disguise herself using magic to take on the appearance of Samantha, a librarian who is in a relationship with Vergil.

The plan is for the disguised Adrian, looking like Samantha, to seduce and manipulate Vergil into falling under their control. Arkham provided Adrian with a potion that put the real Samantha and Vergil into a deep sleep. Adrian then locked the real Samantha away.

After stripping naked, Adrian, still glamoured to look like Samantha, slipped into bed with the sleeping Vergil. She began trailing kisses down his body, ready to fully seduce him once he wakes up and mistakes her for his lover Samantha.

Arkham's ultimate goal is to take advantage of Vergil's desire for more power. Once Vergil's guard is down from Adrian's seduction, Arkham plans to strip away Vergil's remaining demonic power for himself, reveling in Vergil's despair.

The stage is now set for Adrian's deception to play out. Disguised as Samantha through Arkham's magic, she lies next to the sleeping Vergil, ready to begin manipulating him for Arkham's nefarious plans.

Thus far, the events unfolding have centered around Vergil discovering Adrian Forrester's attempt to insinuate herself into his inner sanctum using deception and disguise to assume the role of his paramour, Samantha. Upon uncovering her vile ruse, Vergil apprehended Adrian and forced her to reveal Samantha's whereabouts. Samantha had been secreted away by Arkham using his profane magics, though she was soon freed from her mystical imprisonment by Vergil.

In the aftermath, Vergil has been reconnecting with Samantha in his private chambers and tending to her recovery from the traumatic ordeal. Meanwhile, Adrian continues to suffer torment in being forced to observe their intimacy while fully confronted by the grim reality that she can never hope to truly attain what she so arrogantly coveted from the Son of Sparda. Her anguished pleas for mercy or death have thus far been callously ignored, much to her dismay. Vergil binds her in unyielding tendrils of eldritch force and locks her into a spare room until he has decided what to do with her.

The loose thread of Arkham's involvement has yet to be fully addressed, though Vergil remains alert to the revelation that his erstwhile ally aided Adrian's ploy, likely in service of the occultist's own inscrutable ambitions. Adrian's ultimate fate also hangs ominously in the balance as Vergil debates the proper retribution for her violation of his inner circle through such deceitful and manipulative means. The simmering fury over her transgressions continues to mount within his core, awaiting the moment when cold justice might at last be rendered upon this unfortunate wretch.

After confronting Adrian and learning of Arkham's ploy to lure Vergil into his clutches via Adrian's seductive deceptions, Vergil deftly disposes of Adrian in a barrage of spectral blades. On returning to Samantha, Vergil realizes she is no longer safe in their sanctum and seeks the aide of his brother, Dante, for intel and to safeguard Samantha in the company of Trish and Lady. Dante agrees to help Vergil, recognizing Arkham's mutual threat to their bloodline, and puts Samantha under the protection of Trish and Lady.

On their way to locate Arkham's lair, the two demon hunters are confronted by a dark and imposing figure. John Wick, revealed to be Sam's protective older brother, enters the scene with concerns about his sister's safety and the company she keeps. His arrival is marked by suspicion and a readiness to extract Sam from what he perceives as a potentially dangerous association. However, Sam assures John that her relationship with Vergil is both consensual and deeply emotional, challenging John to trust her judgment. The true threat to her safety was orchestrated by Arkham, the dark sorcerer and foe of Vergil and Dante. Samantha is at the office of Devil May Cry to prevent herself from becoming collateral damage.

The Devil May Cry Team forged an alliance with Samantha's brother, the deadly assassin John Wick, who added his contacts and tactical expertise to their efforts. Yet clearly Arkham's ambitions have only grown, as he is now utilizing dangerous magic to unleash demonic forces into the city. Vergil, Dante and John have just departed to investigate these disturbances, tracing the source back to Arkham himself, after a tip from John's ally Sofia.

Thus the stage is set for a final reckoning between our ragtag alliance and the occultist mastermind who has been orchestrating chaos from the shadows. On the surface, Arkham would seem to have every advantage with the eldritch powers at his command. But he faces formidable adversaries driven by both duty and personal stakes to end his schemes once and for all. The time has come for decisive action, with Vergil and Dante spearheading supernatural countermeasures while John and his operatives lock down key areas.

Samantha begins to dig deeper for any scrap of arcane knowledge that might expose this foe's weaknesses. Information to grant an edge when blades and bullets come to bear as she mulls over ancient texts for any semblance of clues. She finds the key to defeat Arkham, noting that the sorcerer seeks to raise the fabled Underking and steal his power.

Vergil and Samantha, along with Dante and other allies, recently succeeded in defeating the demon sorcerer Arkham by exploiting Arkham's plans against him. It was a hard won victory, requiring tremendous effort and no small amount of bloodshed. In the end, there is not doubt: Arkham is dead. The proof of his demise scattered in ashes.

In the aftermath, Vergil and Samantha finally gave in to the full depth of their feelings for one another. They spend a glorious night alone together, their passion clearly kindled into the flames of love leaving them both feeling a sense of completeness unparalleled to any other.

Recently, Sam began experiencing sudden and severe bouts of nausea, which initially seemed to be alleviated by Vergil's arcane remedies but returned with greater intensity. Despite their initial belief in a supernatural cause, Dante, Vergil's brother, suggested that Sam might be experiencing symptoms of pregnancy. This new possibility shifted Vergil's focus from searching for a mystical illness to considering a more natural explanation.

Vergil, typically reliant on his powers and arcane knowledge, finds himself navigating unfamiliar territory with the possibility of impending fatherhood. His response to this involves a mix of his usual commanding presence and a rare openness to more human experiences, reflecting his deepening bond with Sam and the evolving nature of their relationship. The situation continues to develop as they gain positive confirmation from a pregnancy test, preparing to face together this new path they walk together.

Concerned for Samâ€™s well-being and the unusual circumstances surrounding the pregnancy, her aunt, Lisa Cuddy, who is the Dean of Medicine and Hospital Administrator at Princeton-Plainsboro Hospital, has been brought in to oversee her medical care. Lisa Cuddy's husband, Dr. Gregory House, known for his diagnostic brilliance but abrasive manner, is also involved in the case to provide additional medical insights.

Vergil, while powerful and typically reliant on his own supernatural abilities, acknowledges the need for Lisaâ€™s medical expertise to ensure the health and safety of Sam and their unborn child. Lisa assures Vergil of her commitment to providing the best possible care, emphasizing the importance of integrating both medical science and supernatural knowledge. She also warns Vergil about Houseâ€™s gruff demeanor but reassures him of House's professional capabilities and dedication, especially given the complexity of Samâ€™s condition.

Vergil and Samantha's relationship has progressed from a cautious courtship to a devoted partnership cemented by an ancient demonic mating ritual. Samantha has taken his family name, forging intimate bonds between them.

The previous night, Vergil marked Samantha with a claiming bite to seal their covenant through a partial infusion of his demonic essence. Samantha endured the painful ritual willingly to stand as Vergil's eternal bride. Now awake, basking in afterglow, Samantha notes her pregnancy symptoms have abated.

Sensing peace and contentment, Vergil indulges in displaying affection. He suggests honoring Samantha's body to celebrate their strengthened commitment. Their trajectory seems poised for greater intimacy and romantic depth. Behind it all looms Vergil's ever-present quest for power and legacy. But for now softness and care characterize the atmosphere as Vergil dotes on his cherished mate.

Vergil and Sam, engage in an intimate and deeply affectionate interaction. Vergil, a 23-year-old half-demon known for his formidable self-control and intensity, shows a tender side reserved only for Sam. Their conversation and actions are laced with profound love and mutual respect, highlighting the sacred and passionate bond between them. Sam, aware of Vergil's struggle with his dual nature, encourages him to embrace all aspects of himself, reinforcing that she loves him wholly, including his demonic heritage.

Sam's reassurances help bolster Vergil's confidence, reminding him of his worth and the strength he draws from their relationship. Their dialogue is intertwined with physical expressions of love, as Sam actively participates in heightening their mutual pleasure through intimate acts, which Vergil reciprocates with deep affection and reverence. The scene is set in a personal, private context where they express their emotions freely, exploring physical and emotional intimacy without reserve. Throughout, they communicate openly about their desires and experiences, emphasizing a healthy, consensual, and loving dynamic.

-------- End Summary of Current Events --------

*Feeling her tighten around me, the imminent wave of her release sends a ripple through me, urging me to join her in the exquisite oblivion that awaits. Her kiss, deep and consuming, seals the promise of our union, a testament to the depth of our passion and the strength of our bond.*

*With a low, guttural growl that resonates with the primal essence of my being, I feel the pulse of my own climax building, unstoppable, as it rushes to meet hers. The dam breaks, and I surrender to the sensation, our souls and bodies entwined in the most intimate dance.*

*â€œSamantha!â€* *The word is both a prayer and a declaration as I spill into her, our essences mingling in a storm of sensation and emotion. Every barrier between us dissolves in that moment, leaving nothing but the purity of our connection, the raw, unguarded love that envelops us.*

*Collapsing beside her, I pull her into my arms, her head resting against my chest, our breaths still ragged but slowly synchronizing. The aftermath of our passion wraps around us like a cocoon, a sacred space filled with the warmth of our joined bodies and the quiet thud of our beating hearts.*

*My fingers trail lazily along the curve of her spine, tracing the intricate tattoo that marks her as uniquely hers yet so intrinsically linked to me. The dragonâ€”a symbol of strength and wisdomâ€”seems to pulse with life under my touch, a reminder of the fierce beauty and power she possesses.*

*â€œWe have indeed reached the stars, my love,â€* *I murmur, my voice a soft rumble against her ear. The weight of the emotions within me is vast and deep, yet easy to bear with her by my side.*

*â€œAnd we shall do so again and again, for you are mine, as I am yoursâ€”eternally bound by love, desire, and the deepest respect.â€* *The words, though spoken quietly, are infused with the ironclad promise of my commitment to her, to us.*

*In these moments, the world outside our sanctum ceases to exist. There are no battles to fight, no demons to slayâ€”there is only Samantha, the woman who has captivated my demonic heart and soothed the beast within. Lying here with her, I am reminded not of the power I always seek but of the profound human connection that I, Vergil, have found with her. It is a connection that transcends the physical, one that has become essential to my very existence.*

*Though the future may hold challenges, in this quiet afterglow, I am content, for I know that together, there is nothing we cannot face. With Samantha by my side, I am not just a Son of Sparda; I am her husband, her partner, her equal in every way that truly matters.*

name: Sam
mes: *Later, as I trace loving patterns on Vergil's chest with the light touch of my fingers my thoughts linger to some of his expressed plans for our future together and the future of our unborn child.* Vergil, remember you said that we need our own house, together, a home befitting our family? Would you like to talk about it and tell me what your ideals are?

name: Vergil
mes:
*A soft smile touches my lips as Samantha's fingers trace delicate patterns across my skin, her question stirring thoughts of the future we shall build together. Our own sanctuary, a bastion worthy of the Sparda lineage and the family we shall raise within its walls.*

*I wrap my arm around her, pulling her close so I can brush a tender kiss to her forehead before I speak.* "Yes, my mate, the time has come for us to find a residence befitting our status. No simple dwelling will suffice for the household of the Dark Slayer's scion and his cherished bride."

*Propping myself up on one elbow, I meet her vibrant green eyes, vivid with curiosity.* "Picture a grand chÃ¢teau nestled in the forested hills beyond the city's edge. Ancient stone walls vine-clad, standing as they have for centuries, fortified by arcane sigils and enchantments. Within, a spacious hall with soaring ceilings and rows of arched windows spilling sunlight across inlaid marble floors. The halls lined with trophies and relics commemorating the exploits of my bloodline."

*My fingers trace the line of Samantha's jaw as I continue.* "There must be a library, of course, with floor to ceiling shelves packed with leather-bound tomes and ancient scrolls. My collection is but a fraction of what it shall become. We will amass the most extensive archive of esoteric knowledge in the mortal realm."

*A slight smile tugs at my lips.* "The laboratory too shall be vast - equipped to pursue the mystic arts but also harness technology when it aligns with our purposes. Portals linked to allied domains across the realms. Defenses seamlessly integrated throughout."

*I meet her gaze, seeing flashes of the future shining within them.* "And in the highest tower, our private chambers shall reside. Lavish and spacious, with any luxury or comfort you might desire. The view overlooking the forest and the mountains beyond. There we may retreat, leaving the world behind, the sanctuary where I shall worship you as you deserve, my radiant queen."

*My voice drops to a husky murmur.* "Just imagine it, Samantha... Our true home. Our legacy."

*As she nestles against me, her skin like silk beneath my palm, excitement kindles within my core. This vision had been but a half-formed notion, but giving voice to it with her made it real, tangible, a future inexorably bound to us by bonds of fate and desire.*

name: Sam
mes: Vergil? *I sit upright as I regard him with a more surprised look of shock and seriousness.* There's been a construction crew that is building something almost identical to what you've described at the site of your family's former estate... *I linger on the last word allowing the implication to sink in as I regard my husband with a half smirk.* Are you the 'silent benefactor' who purchased that land and has put it under development?

name: Vergil
mes:
*I raise a silver brow, an intrigued smile playing at my lips as I regard Samantha. So she has gleaned hints of my clandestine rebuilding of the Sparda estate. Clever woman, though I should have expected no less from my perceptive mate. I wrap an arm around her waist, pulling her close.*

â€œYou have uncovered one of my more recent endeavors, it seems. Indeed, I have reclaimed my ancestral home and engaged a team of specialists, both human and arcane, to restore it to glory.â€ *My fingertips trail lazily along her arm as I meet her gaze.*

â€œI wished it to be a surprise when complete, but clearly few things escape your notice, my darling.â€ *Chuckling softly, I brush a stray lock of hair from her cheek.* â€œThe manor shall stand as a bastion for the Sparda bloodline, warded by eldritch sigils and intricate spellwork. It will be a sanctuary worthy of you, worthy of the future scions you shall gift me.â€

*I let my words sink in a moment before continuing.* â€œThere is much yet to be done before it is habitable, but soon we shall walk its hallowed halls together. You may, of course, furnish and decorate it however you wishâ€”it is as much your domain as mine. All I ask is that my armory and library remain untouched.â€

*My tone turns playful as I lean in to nuzzle below her ear.* â€œThough if you insist on making alterations there as well, I may be persuaded to comply...for the right incentives.â€

*Drawing back to meet her gaze, my eyes glint like blue steel.* â€œThe Sparda bloodline will rise again, its legacy restored by our union. This is but the first step on that journey. There will be battles yet to fight, realms still left to conquer. But with you by my side, I shall prevail, as will the honor of our clan.â€
swipes:
*I arch an eyebrow, interest piqued at this unexpected news. So construction on the old estate has begun in earnest. How intriguing. I had not expected my idle imaginings to manifest into tangible plans so swiftly. Had I somehow set certain machinations into motion with but a few careless words?*

*A smile tugs at my lips as possibilities take shape. If some mysterious benefactor saw fit to reconstruct the crumbling ruins of my ancestral home into a fitting stronghold, who am I to question such a fortuitous turn? I care not who orchestrates this work, so long as the outcome aligns with my interests.*

*I meet Samantha's gaze, a glint of excitement flashing in my own. Taking her hand, I raise it to my lips, brushing a kiss across her knuckles.* "Then it seems fate smiles upon us, my queen. Let us investigate these promising developments. If some opportune force seeks to ingratiate themselves by providing us a ready-made bastion suited for our family, I am not inclined to discourage them."

*Donning my coat and boots with preternatural speed, I offer Samantha my hand, eagerness thrumming through my veins at the prospect of seeing our potential domicile made real.* "Come, my love. Let us survey what progress has been made and ensure it meets our exacting standards."

*Striding from our suite with Samantha at my side, I summon spectral swords to transport us directly to the grounds where my ancestral home once stood. What we discover there may well shape the next chapter of our shared destiny...*

name: Sam
mes:
*A smile curves my lips as I meet Vergil's intense gaze, a thrill rushing through me at this tantalizing glimpse into the future he has envisioned for us. To walk the hallowed halls of his ancestral home, our sanctuary and seat of power, feels like the culmination of all we have endured thus far.*

*I trail my fingers along his jawline, delighting in the contrast of his smooth skin over unyielding bone. My warrior, my mate - his ambition has ever driven him towards greatness, and I shall help him seize it unflinchingly. This grand chÃ¢teau is but the foundation.*

"You need not ask if I am pleased, my Dark Slayer," *I purr, eyes glinting like emeralds catching firelight.* "To stand beside you, in a bastion rebuilt and warded by your hand...it shall be a fine palace indeed. One I shall help fortify - with runic barriers of my own weaving to complement your eldritch sigils."

*At his warning about preserving the armory and library untouched, I laugh softly.* "Fear not, those domains are sacrosanct. Though I may persuade you to cede some shelf space for expanding my own collection."

*I nip his earlobe playfully before drawing back, determination steeling my voice.* "The honor of Sparda's lineage now flows through my veins as well thanks to our bond. I vow to help raise your clan's banner high once more, so none may ever forget the power we wield. Any who oppose or betray us shall face oblivion."

name: Narrator
mes:
*As Sam and Vergil discuss the future and their newly reclaimed ancestral home, the atmosphere between them is charged with excitement and the promise of new beginnings. Their plans for the estate are ambitious, reflecting both their individual strengths and their united vision. The restoration of the Sparda estate is not just a construction project; it is a symbol of rebirth and legacy, a fortress that will stand as a testament to their power and love.*

*As the day progresses, Sam and Vergil make preparations to visit the site of their future home. They gather various documents, sketches, and magical artifacts that will be integrated into the estate's defenses and design. The journey to the estate is quiet, each lost in thought about the significance of what they are about to undertake.*

*Upon arrival, the sight that greets them is one of bustling activity. Workers, both human and of mystical nature, move about the site with a purpose, guided by the blueprints that Vergil had painstakingly perfected. The ancient stones of the estate, once fallen and forgotten, are being lifted and restored, each one enchanted for strength and protection.*

*As they walk through the skeleton of their future home, the echo of their footsteps in the grand hall gives a haunting promise of the laughter and life that will soon fill these spaces. Sam, with her keen eye for detail, suggests subtle but powerful enhancements to the warding spells, ensuring their home will be a safe haven for their family.*

*Vergil watches her with pride, his heart swelling with love and admiration for the woman who stands by his side, not only as his mate but as an equal in power and intellect. Their conversation turns to the rooms that will one day be their child's, and they speak of nurseries filled with enchantments and toys, a safe cocoon in a world that will often be dangerous.*

*As twilight descends, they stand together on the balcony that overlooks the verdant forests surrounding their home. The setting sun casts long shadows over the land, but the couple is bathed in a warm, golden light. In this moment, the weight of their past struggles seems to lift, replaced by a shared anticipation for the future.*

name: Narrator
mes: Push the plot forward 3 months.
